author: {'steamid': '76561199010042150', 'num_games_owned': 3874, 'num_reviews': 2454, 'playtime_forever': 218, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 218, 'last_played': 1672875368}
review:
I am 32 years old.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and we adopted our son together. Both are now 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I felt lost and unhappy. I was self-destructive. One day, I was so angry with everything spiraling out of control that I punched a concrete wall in a moment of overwhelming emotion. This resulted in breaking my fifth metacarpal in my right hand—the hand I worked with, played games with, and used to carry my children to bed—the hand I desperately needed to ensure I could continue providing.

Upon learning the severity of the self-inflicted damage, I became almost suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man, with no history of depression or anxiety. I had never experienced anger outbursts, nor was I the type to break down and cry, but I was in a tough situation that truly prevented me from seeing the light on the other side.

With nothing better to do, I looked for a game I could play WITH ONE HAND while recovering. Somehow, I stumbled upon this game and read some of the comments. I decided it was worth a try... I must admit I didn't beat the game, nor did I play as much as some of you. In fact, I may have played this game for only a day or two. That being said, after doing so, I had a new joy and hope for life. I managed to leave behind the pain and suffering that had been thrust upon me. I could experience the joy and happiness of other people. I relaxed for 5 ♥♥♥♥ minutes listening to this music, long enough to realize that I would be okay.

After realizing this, I turned off the game and went back to work. My hand hurt a lot, but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so sorry for myself and became the father I needed to be at that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving like.

Today, I am close friends with the mother of my children. We don't fight, argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents and friends.

Now I have 3 children. My third child is, wait, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my separation, and we just unexpectedly stumbled into each other's lives. We have been dating for a year and are very happy together.

Moral of the story: you never know what life has in store for you, and if I had given up when all odds were against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you.

author: {'steamid': '76561198151293050', 'num_games_owned': 48, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1626803512}
review:
[b]1. Gameplay: 8/10 - Solides Plattformvergnügen [/b]

"Canyon Capers" bietet ein einfaches, aber dennoch unterhaltsames Gameplay, das sich auf klassisches Jump'n'Run fokussiert. Die Levelgestaltung ist solide, und die Herausforderungen steigern sich graduell, was dem Spieler eine angenehme Lernkurve ermöglicht. Die Steuerung ist leicht zugänglich und reagiert präzise, was ein angenehmes Spielerlebnis gewährleistet. Die Integration von verschiedenen Power-ups und Sammelgegenständen sorgt für Abwechslung und erhöht den Spielspaß.

[b]2. Handlung: 6/10 - Einfacher Rahmen ohne Tiefgang[/b]

Die Handlung von "Canyon Capers" dient eher als einfacher Rahmen für das Gameplay. Während der Spieler auf eine Reise durch verschiedene Landschaften geschickt wird, fehlt es der Geschichte an Tiefe und komplexen Charakterentwicklungen. Dennoch erfüllt sie ihren Zweck als Motivation für das Voranschreiten im Spiel.

[b]3. Grafik und Design: 7/10 - Charmanter Retro-Look[/b]

Die Pixelgrafik verleiht "Canyon Capers" einen charmanten Retro-Look. Die bunten Level sind liebevoll gestaltet, und der cartoonartige Stil der Charaktere passt gut zum lockeren Gesamtkonzept des Spiels. Visuell mag es nicht besonders anspruchsvoll sein, aber es erzeugt eine nostalgische Atmosphäre.

[b]4. Sound und Musik: 7/10 - Stimmige Begleitung[/b]

Die Musik und Soundeffekte von "Canyon Capers" sind passend zur Spielatmosphäre. Die Hintergrundmusik trägt gut zur Stimmung bei, ohne aufdringlich zu sein. Obwohl keine herausragende musikalische Untermalung, stören die Soundeffekte nicht und fügen sich gut in das Gesamterlebnis ein.

[b]5. Technische Aspekte: 9/10 - Stabile Performance[/b]

In punkto technischer Aspekte überzeugt "Canyon Capers" mit einer stabilen Performance auf verschiedenen Systemen. Während meines Tests traten keine größeren technischen Probleme oder Bugs auf. Die Steuerung, ob über Tastatur oder Controller, ist präzise, und die Ladezeiten sind akzeptabel.

[b]6. Wiederspielbarkeit und Langzeitmotivation: 8/10 - Motivierende Elemente[/b]

Die Wiederspielbarkeit ist eine der Stärken des Spiels. Das Sammeln von Schätzen und das Streben nach Bestzeiten in den Leveln motivieren zu wiederholtem Spielen. Die Auswahl verschiedener Charaktere mit individuellen Fähigkeiten erhöht die Langzeitmotivation und erlaubt verschiedene Herangehensweisen.

[b]7. Community und Support: 7/10 - Engagierte Gemeinschaft[/b]

Die Community rund um "Canyon Capers" mag nicht so umfangreich wie bei großen AAA-Titeln sein, aber sie ist dennoch engagiert. Die Entwickler zeigen sich offen für Feedback, bieten regelmäßige Updates an und unterstützen die Spielerbasis.

[b]Gesamtbewertung: 7.5/10 - Spaßiges Plattformspiel für Retro-Liebhaber[/b]

Insgesamt ist "Canyon Capers" ein spaßiges 2D-Plattformspiel mit einem charmanten Retro-Flair. Obwohl es nicht die Tiefe und den Umfang größerer Produktionen bietet, liefert es eine unterhaltsame Spielerfahrung zu einem erschwinglichen Preis. Ideal für Fans von unkomplizierten Jump'n'Run-Abenteuern, die nostalgische Erinnerungen wecken möchten.

author: {'steamid': '76561197998985381', 'num_games_owned': 1678, 'num_reviews': 173, 'playtime_forever': 421, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 320, 'last_played': 1699672702}
review:
This game is poorly designed and poorly implemented.

- The level design is bad.
- The level graphics are bad. Sometimes impossible to know what is background and what is foreground.
- The enemy placement is bad.
- The enemy collision is bad.
  → If you jump on top of two enemies, you get hit. You can only jump on one enemy per time.
  → If you get hit, you get temporary invincibility for a few seconds. You can't attack enemies during this time.
- All enemies respawn shortly after being killed. After a while, you figure out it's easier to ignore enemies and tank any hits.
- The end-of-level score and 3-star rating isn't very clear, and quite frustrating.
- All the secondary collectibles disappear after you complete the primary objective, which means you can't collect them for higher score.
- Have I mentioned the level design is bad? You have a time limit, but you are also very limited in your movement options. (Often having to wait for moving platforms or having to take a very long route.)
- The sequence of moving platforms are not synchronized. You have to wait for a few cycles until the platforms align favorably. And then you get knocked off by a flying enemy.

Well, at least the game is quite stable: I didn't notice any crashes nor game-breaking glitches.

review:
*Chyba otrzymałem ją za darmo kilka lat temu.
Słaba platformówka, w której dobre jest to, że można ją w miarę szybko ukończyć i zdobyć wszystkie osiągnięcia. Poziomy same w sobie nie dają żadnej satysfakcji, po prostu skaczesz po planszy i zbierasz co trzeba, a jedyny problem to limit czasu. Czasami checkpointy teleportują pół planszy, a kilka razy miałem je pod ostrzem lub inną pułapką, która od razu zabijała. Najlepsze są sekrety-ślimaki, których nawet nie można wszystkich zdobyć. Za darmo spoko, kupować nie warto.

author: {'steamid': '76561198021864291', 'num_games_owned': 1727, 'num_reviews': 117, 'playtime_forever': 265, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 265, 'last_played': 1673130309}
review:
Ja, also, ehm.
Canyon Capers ist ein 2D Platformer, der nicht ganz so deep ist. Zwar unterscheidet sich das Ziel pro Level (etwa "Sammel alle Kisten ein" oder "Sammel alle Edelsteine ein"), jedoch ist das Erlebnis sehr trist. Die Level sind nicht sehr umfangreich, das Gameplay macht so viel Spaß wie ein Zahnarztbesuch und die Gegner sind halt da. Ich hatte leider sehr wenig Spaß (die restlichen 4 Spielstunden kamen durch Sammelkartenfarming zustande) und war dann doch sehr froh als es vorbei war. 

Definitiv nicht empfehlenswert. Vorallem, weil es als Vollpreis einfach mal 6€ kostet. Da hol ich mir doch lieber einen Döner bei Haus des Döners (muss zwar dann nochmal 50 Cent drauflegen, aber dafür weiß ich, dass ich dann was richtig Gutes bekomme). Müsst ihr wissen.

author: {'steamid': '76561198068174012', 'num_games_owned': 690, 'num_reviews': 385, 'playtime_forever': 246, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 246, 'last_played': 1648409251}
review:
Canyon Capers (2014)

A very... interesting game to say the least. You control this guy who collect stuff to progress towards the next level. Later in the game you can use other characters all with a unique ability. The gameplay is very stiff, it feels like a 2001 flash game you play on those shady websites back in school where the anti-virus is going nuts but you just ignore that. I'm probably not going to ever complete this game, I feel its... ok for what it is. Just don't expect too much with this one, but you might kill off a few hours with it if you literally have nothing els to play.

5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198063828954', 'num_games_owned': 463, 'num_reviews': 27, 'playtime_forever': 1115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 645, 'last_played': 1622246673}
review:
If you are still buying this in the year 2021 you've got some problems. Not recommended, completely outdated game. You will hate yourself when attempting to go for the achievements, just like I hate myself right now after getting this in like 2015 and grabbing some achievements while waiting for the trading cards to pop up.

Just some examples because I feel like writing a negative review without really stating why would be rude.
- The level design isnt great. Its trying to be open and give you a choice what to collect first, but in the end the Vortex (place to leave the level) will spawn in a spot that makes it seems like there was "the optimal path" which will make you lose time and points and with that stars, which theres 3 to get from every level. (mobile games from 2012 much, huh?).
- The difficulty spiked up quite fast and isnt in your common range of gameplay balancing. Most of the levels are doable but often they will just feel unfair at parts and later on they will be stacked with traps and unenjoyable platforming. I studied gamedesign, this game doesnt do much of it right.
- The graphics didnt age well and the characters look ugly (they remind me of Bolbi Stroganovsky from Jimmy Neutron. slap slap slap, clap clap clap.)
- The mission objectives are in an ever repeating cycle. Not interesting.
- The controls. You will start hating the game first, then you will continue hating the game and yourself for the actions that you will do, that will bring failure to you. And theres only [Left Arrow] [Right Arrow] and [Spacebar], yet the controls feel so so bad and you dont really see yourself improving with them.

+ Theres one thing thats done well in the game and thats the different abilities of the characters, sometimes you wanna switch to a different one for a specific level to get through better. Thats cool and all but doesnt negate all the bad stuff.

author: {'steamid': '76561198347447937', 'num_games_owned': 369, 'num_reviews': 277, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 13, 'last_played': 1598324308}
review:
After playing through the first 5 stages of the game, I cannot recommend this game. I will update my review once I finish the game. It's super basic platforming where you collect coins and diamonds to end the level, that is literally it. You can jump on top of enemies to kill them.

I did notice the difficulty ramp up as you get further into the game where things like blood dropping from ceilings are in levels and a few more new enemies. It plays like a classic DOS or Sega Genesis platformer but with absolutely basic aspects.

The one thing it has going for it are the easy achievements. They just keep popping. So if you're buying this game, do not pay more than $0.25 to as high as say, $0.69 for it. That's as high as it's worth imo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198016913653', 'num_games_owned': 305, 'num_reviews': 42, 'playtime_forever': 1121, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1121, 'last_played': 1593825327}
review:
Date Written: 07/10/2020

[h1]This Game Isn’t For You[/h1]

TL:DR Too many issues in this game. Don’t waste your time or money.

Canyon capers is a Collectible Platforming game. First, I should say I played all 50 levels. Which is a very small percentage of players based on the achievement stats through steam. There are several issues with this game which make what could have been a difficult game way more difficult.

[list]
[*]The game design isn’t clear. There is too much randomness.
[*]The hitboxes are not accurate on enemies ledges, and the characters.
[*]The jump is floaty.
[*]Dying to instant kills can sometimes put you in a death loop of respawning in a position where the environment kills you instantly again and again and again and again with little chance of escaping.
[*]The art is ugly.
[*]There is no story.
[/list]

I see many reviews suggesting this game for kids. It's not. Give your kids a good game, not this.

For a sneak peak watch my Canyon Capers play through in my Twitch Collections: https://www.twitch.tv/collections/fWYhWPFQHRZYqA

author: {'steamid': '76561198446884286', 'num_games_owned': 649, 'num_reviews': 214, 'playtime_forever': 223, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 223, 'last_played': 1592143288}
review:
Basit bir platform oyunu... Şu kadar hede hödö topla, belli bir puana ulaş ve sonraki bölüme geç mantığında ilerleyen bir oyun. 

Bu incelemeyi yazdığım tarihteki fiyatı olan 13 TL'lik ücretine göre yorum yaparsak, parasını haketmeyen bir oyun. Ücretsiz olarak tedarik ettiğim bu oyunu, "Neymiş la bu?" diyip açtım ve bir kaç saat oynadım. Vakit geçirtir ama öyle ahım şahım birşey beklemeyin. Belki 1-2 lira gibi bir miktara alıp oynanabilir. En azından çıkan kartlarla aşağı yukarı parasını amorte eder ama gidip de 13 TL vermeyin.

author: {'steamid': '76561198077153956', 'num_games_owned': 4293, 'num_reviews': 481, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1578261024}
review: Казалось, что может пойти не так в клоне Марио, где забавные человечки собирают драгоценности, обезвреживают бомбы и прыгают на головы милых зверушек. Ведь есть 7 играбельных персонажей, 60 напряжённых уровней в разных локациях и супер способности, позволяющие облегчить прохождение почти 4-х часовой игры. А теперь загибаем пальцы, жуткая анимация - таких дурацких прыжков я никогда не видел; идиотский таймер, раздражающий тиканьем со своей середины, причём Canyon Capers полностью завязан на поиске, так что полный сбор предметов не гарантирует счастливого конца. Продолжаем - тупейшая модель попаданий, любой пиксель вас не хило задевает, схожая ситуация с воскрешением - умереть в игре нельзя, но восстать можно очень далеко от места гибели. И главное - скорость игры. Какой бы не был платформер по своей сути, он не должен быть медленным, ну не может анимация прыжка длиться больше секунды, в этом заторможенном мире настолько напрягает движение персонажей, что после первого уровня его хочется напрочь снести. И если это сделаете, ничего не потеряете - 5.0.

author: {'steamid': '76561198300270231', 'num_games_owned': 5385, 'num_reviews': 894, 'playtime_forever': 1567, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1567, 'last_played': 1548248561}
review:
보석, 동전, 과일, 보물상자 등을 줍기 위한 통통한 녀석들의 깡충거림 [b]《협곡에서 뛰어보자》[/b]다. 전형적인, 너무 전형적인 플랫폼 게임이다. 공격 버튼 그런 것도 없다. 조작이라곤 이동과 점프가 전부다. 나름 피지컬 차이라고는 압력 조절 정도일까? 스페이스바 키를 살살 또는 꾹 눌러서 점프의 높이를 조절 가능하다. 난이도는 솔직히 3 star 를 감안하더라도 어려운 편은 아닌 듯. 귀찮아서 그렇지.

 + 게임을 진행할수록 점점 더 늘어나는 플레이어블 캐릭터
 + 3 star 가 있는 게임들 중에선 그래도 판정이 후한 편이라고 생각
 + 매끄러운 조작감
 + 적절한 플레이 타임 및 난이도(전체 5레벨, 각 레벨당 총 10스테이지)
 + 공식 한글화(근데 구글 번역기 보다 어색한 수준)
 + 트레이딩 카드 존재(플탐 대비 파밍시간 적절)

 - 약간 아쉽게 느껴지는 가성비(한 3,300원 정도면 어땠을까 싶다)
 - 질릴 정도로 많게 느껴지는 레벨의 수(적어도 나에겐 그렇다)
 - 때문에 원타임으로 오래 플레이하기에는 힘듦
 - 3 star 시스템으로 인해 어쩔 수 없이 도전과제 올클리어가 좀 귀찮은 편

 그래도 '3 star' 판정이 후한 편이라 다행이라고 생각합니다. 시간, 생명 보너스 그런거 신경 안 쓰고 맵에 있는 모든 수집품을 전부 먹기만 하면 대부분은 다 별 3개 획득할 수 있습니다. 그리고 뭔가 진짜 군더더기 없이 깔끔한 거 같았는데 점수가 못 미친다면, 해당 스테이지에 '달팽이' 가 존재할 가능성이 있습니다. 그것도 먹어주면 수월하게 별 3개 받습니다. 후, 근데 원체 재미가 없어서··· 날마다 조금씩 조금씩 진행하다 보면 이것도 어느새 달성되겠죠. 재미가 없긴 한데, 게임성 자체는 일단 나쁘게 느껴지진 않기에 엄지는 올리겠습니다.

author: {'steamid': '76561198030784015', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11196, 'playtime_forever': 122, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 122, 'last_played': 1569680121}
review:
Canyon Capers is a retro pixel platformer/item collector with a hawaiian theme.   Collect gems and gold from chests while avoiding snakes and green mice.  You can also play soccer and hit targets with the soccerball.

The game displays and scrolls well enough but the gameplay is annoying, being time based and with respawning enemies.  The retro pixel graphic theme isn't consistent and the game would have been better with better graphics, considering you can get older AAA games with 3D graphics for less than the whopping $10 price tag this game has.  I can't recommend it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198032214069', 'num_games_owned': 662, 'num_reviews': 32, 'playtime_forever': 300, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 300, 'last_played': 1569307211}
review:
[h1]Чергова пародія на платформер[/h1]


Не заглиблюватимуся в опис всіх недоліків цієї гри, я ще надто молодий. Пережити це вдруге та остаточно деградувати до рівня розробників – не для мене.

Коротко про головне:
Огидно продуманий геймплей - тони нудних, одноманітних супротивників, здатних вбити вас завжди і скрізь. А з'явитеся ви просто під ними, щоб померти знову. Мій рекорд – 8 респаунів на одному місці. Розумієте, 9 миттєвих смертей без шансу відійти убік. Проти деяких ворогів ви абсолютно безсилі – до них не дістати просто, а ось вони вас дістануть. Ще й як.
[b][i]одноманітні локації[/i][/b] - за проходження гри я так і не побачив, а чим це вони відрізняються одна від одної. Ті самі вороги, ті самі завдання, той самий (!) фоновий малюнок. Оплески стоячи. 20 років тому ВЖЕ робили КРАЩЕ. Або хоча б старалися. Видно розробникам було просто самим нудно ліпити цей "шедевр", а отже, можна і не морочитися.
[b][i]Сірі персонажі[/i][/b] не відрізняються один від одного практично нічим. Тільки у двох можливостей більш-менш юзабельні, інші ж просто смітник для кількості. Скіли деяких взагалі не застосовуються ніде й ніяк, але кому це цікаво.

1 із 10. Заохочувальний бал розробникам – за те, що змусили себе ненавидіти.

author: {'steamid': '76561198061657440', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 450, 'playtime_forever': 522, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 522, 'last_played': 1564033838}
review:
2d eğlenceli bir platform oyunu. Tamamen el becerisi ve dikkate odaklı. Karşınızdaki alana dağıtılmış olan mücevherleri, verilen süre içerisinde, bölgedeki yaratıklara yakalanmadan toplamaya çalışıyorsunuz. istenilen minimum mücevher miktarını yakaladığınız zaman bir sonraki bölüme geçiş için solucan deliği açılıyor ve bölümü bitiriyorsunuz. 

Belki her yetişkine hitap etmeyebilir ama küçük kardeşiniz yada çocuğunuz için ideal bir oyun diyebilirim.

author: {'steamid': '76561198046595924', 'num_games_owned': 4780, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 41, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 41, 'last_played': 1551762225}
review:
Canyon Capers is trying to be a retro platformer and to make you feel like you would be playing some of the legendary arcade platformers from 90s only in better graphic presentation. However, instead of taking good concepts and  trying to put them into modern game mechanisms it is taking the worse like time limit and respawning enemies and adding bad level design and clunky control. It is typical example of the game which is rather frustrating than challenging.

Pros: - Solid graphics
         - Attempt to bring retro platforming to modern machines

Cons: - Clunky control
          - Time Limit
          - Bad Level Design
          - Rather frustrating than challenging

I need to give this game Thumbs down and 4 out of 10.

My Video Review can be found here:
https://youtu.be/JXum1fRX8mQ

author: {'steamid': '76561198325967721', 'num_games_owned': 1271, 'num_reviews': 255, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 70, 'last_played': 1580130319}
review:
Graficky naprostá ohyzdnost. Ovládání je neobratné. Hra se neobtěžuje zmínit co je vůbec naším cílem. Naprosto generická plošinovka která se velmi rychle omrzí. Lépe řečeno, nebaví už od začátku. Pro představu, je to takový ten typ hry co jste si mohli koupit na takových těch kompilačních cédéčkách v trafice kde jich bylo několik za pár korun. Chtít za tenhle počin 6 euro je prachsprostá drzost.

Pokud je vám 5-11 let tak vás tahle hra možná něčím zaujme, ale jinak je to ztráta času. 3/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198029781668', 'num_games_owned': 1061, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 28, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 28, 'last_played': 1554653355}
review:
This game had the potential to be good, but there is a lot wrong with it.

The controls feel floaty, you can find yourself with a really bad respawn loop, hitting enemies and enemies hitting you is very wonky, and even using the menus feels slow.

I have been hit by a rolling rock, which threw me into a boulder, which crushed me, wait for respawn, come back in the boulder, wait for respawn, come back right in front of the boulder, wait for respawn, and then barely make it out before it continued.

Enemies hit boxes are wonky for both your attacks and theirs, though it is simply folloing classic Mario style combat, jump on the enemies to defeat them, hurt from any other way.  I know I've been hit by a snake by a noticable distance ahead of it, as well as when two enemies are in one spot, jumping on them kills one and the other hits you.  If you are hit, you are granted a brief invulnerability window, during which you cannot hurt enemies either, so it only barely helps you.

In menus, there is a delay between each time you move your cursor from option to option.  Unlocking the second character, I found that each character appearently has traits, the first one seems to show where the exit portal is, where the second one is not clear at all, the image shows arrows pointing to gems, which comparing to the first character's image suggest it points out all the gems, instead it sometimes points out gems, and there doesn't seem to be a rhyme or reason which ones.

The levels are simple and fun enough, semi-linear getting bigger and bigger as you progress, but making it so if you want to collect all the pickups on one of the fairly early levels, the biggest one I started, you have to go to nearly the end, and take a shortcut to the beginning. having to go through a somewhat annoying platform section at least twice.

I can see this becoming good, becoming something to enjoy simple fun with, but it is just frustrating, and needs work, which I doubt it will ever get.

author: {'steamid': '76561198025571064', 'num_games_owned': 2178, 'num_reviews': 1520, 'playtime_forever': 350, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1561832005}
review:
[h1] Карточки[/h1]

[i] Canyon Capers[/i] – самый обычный платформер эпохи [i] Greenlight[/i]. Отсутствие сюжета, простой и еле развивающийся геймплей. В большинстве случаев нам нужно тупо собрать все камни на уровне, а затем прыгнуть в появившейся портал. Мешать нам будет обилие врагов, которые ещё и спавнятся; счётчик времени и кривая механика игры. В итоге всё сделано максимально безвкусно.

Графическая составляющая всеми силами пытается быть похожей на представителей 90-ых годов: тут вам и относительное разнообразие текстур и средней насыщенности цвета, но однообразный дизайн выдаёт всё это притворство с потрохами. Сопровождать нас будут мерзкие звуки и цикличный саундтрек, представленный одной песней в жанре кантри.

Обливать помоями эту игру можно бесконечно, но по сравнению с новым поколением из [i] Direct’а Canyon Capers[/i] смотрится величественно, однако от этого игра не становится лучше.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034662637', 'num_games_owned': 206, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 368, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 368, 'last_played': 1547667931}
review:
Sabe aquele trabalho de grupo da sua escola ou faculdade que separa o que é pra cada um fazer, um coloca o fundo do slide amarelo, o outro com a fonte azul e outro com um monte de imagem, no final todo mundo fala que vai rever o trabalho e ninguém olha e fica do jeito que está? Então, esse jogo é a mesma coisa. 

Se você der uma olhada rápida, e jogar algumas partidas, até poderia ter saído algo digno de um jogo, indiscutivelmente, se trata de uma versão beta. 

Parece que jogaram tudo no aleatório e deixaram rolar. Objetos e monstros caindo na sua cabeça do nada, parecendo que fugiu de um cenário pra outro. Tem partes que não é possível passar sem morrer, o respawn foi muito mal pensado e elaborado. As vezes você nasce em baixo, as vezes em cima, as vezes volta pra traz, as vezes vai pra frente, as vezes sai rolando em linha reta e matando todos os monstros, as vezes você morre 4 vezes seguidas no spawn antes de conseguir nem ao menos dar um passo.

Dá pra relevar um pouco, se jogar só alguns minutos por dia, mesmo assim não recomendo o jogo.

Única coisa que pode salvar, dependendo do seu gosto, é a jogabilidade simples e fluída. Pela menos não é travada e responde bem aos comandos. (Também, um jogo que você só anda e pula, é o mínimo que a gente espera)

author: {'steamid': '76561198015003424', 'num_games_owned': 1489, 'num_reviews': 262, 'playtime_forever': 382, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 382, 'last_played': 1544991967}
review: Canyon Capers is bad, there is no two ways about it. Considering how simple the graphics are, performance is simply atrocious. The way the computer starts to churn as soon as you get into the main menu, you would think you are playing a AAA title. That is the least of the game's problems, because gameplay falls somewhere between dull and infuriating, and starts to lean heavily toward the later as the game progresses. There are five game worlds in total, but you would never know because they all look and play the same. The single annoying music track that plays on a loop will undoubtedly drive most people insane long before they reach the later levels where the game just starts throwing every infuriating enemy and environmental danger at the player at once, without any rhyme or reason to the level design. But then again, most people will probably be bored out of their minds long before the music becomes repetitive. In short, Canyon Capers is not worth a dollar, let alone seven, and is a giant waste of time and sanity.

review:

review:
[h1]No lo recomiendo [/h1]

[list]
     [*]La ambientación gráfica es pésima y poco original
     [*]El entorno musical no es agradable, ya que existe altibajos que no generan un armonía.
     [*]A pesar de que trata de llevar un concepto o idea, no es apreciable y muy poco notable.
     [*]No existe una configuración de control que se pueda personalizar.
     [*]A medida se juega se vuelve aburrido y tedioso.
[/list]

P.D. El juego lo adquirí en un sorteo.

author: {'steamid': '76561197992029231', 'num_games_owned': 4127, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 19, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 19, 'last_played': 1526325658}
review:
WARNING: These are initial impressions of the game- my thoughts after a short time of play. Since Steam does not let me denote this, I feel it only fair to put this in the fore of the 'review'.

Disclosure: I recieved this game via a bundle I purchased. This has little or no bearing on my review/impressions- I'd rather play the game and judge it on it its merits, anyhow.

Fun little time waster, objective-based platformer that's really quite a lot of fun in short bursts. Classic 3-star structure on the levels based on what you do/how quickly you finish the level. Level design can be a little cluttered, nothing particularly awful though. Controls are quite responsive, looks to be a mobile port but it runs well so I don't see any problem with that. Had I not gotten this in a bundle I most likely wouldn't have bought it for the current asking price of $6.99- seems to me half that might be fairer (granted I got it in a bundle on a site I trust). Ultimately price is a subjective issue anyhow, not going to dock it to a not recommend for that alone, because ultimately I see many indie devs setting their prices a tad high and that's a whole other ballpark of discussion. Will update if I play further and have more thoughts on it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113758912', 'num_games_owned': 1738, 'num_reviews': 289, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1524266526}
review:
Поиграть можно не более 30 минут.. 

Плюсы:
+ Карточки и ачивки.

Минусы:
- Раздражающие удары случайных монстров; 
- Cпрыгнуть вниз через платформу нельзя, только запрыгнуть сквозь нее; 
- Ужасная и надоедливая музыка, которая постоянно повторяется.
- Геймплей предельно туп, и за счёт свое корявости, игра становится сложной.
- Цена.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044687300', 'num_games_owned': 559, 'num_reviews': 198, 'playtime_forever': 2038, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 989, 'last_played': 1523800449}
review:
Canyon Capers — инди-экшен, платформер. Это все, что нуно знать об игре, ибо все остальное просто плачевно и ужасно в ней. Играем за какого-тол толстячка, который, ненай зачем, бегает по уровню, собирает алмазы и сундуки с золотом. Конечно, всё это на время и за очки. Всё записывается в общий счет и вылагается на общее обозрение.
Наверно, я зря так сказал, что игра ужасна. Но она настолько примитивно сделана, настолько... слов не нахожу. Что-то подобное было популярно в нулевых, и оно понятно - технологии другие, да и компьютеры слабые, вот и был спрос на простые игры, простые цвета и понятный гемплей.
На момент написания обзора, цена на игру составляет 149 рублей, и это несказанно много за игру такого масштаба. Только на халяву такую брать. Не тратьте деньги.

author: {'steamid': '76561198078894531', 'num_games_owned': 4713, 'num_reviews': 433, 'playtime_forever': 229, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 229, 'last_played': 1521883674}
review: Bardzo słaba platformówka w której biegasz po planszy by zebrać obiekty a potem wskakujesz w wir. Kiedy wiele innych platformówek ma ciekawe rzeczy jak podwójne a nawet potrójne skoki, bronie do pokonywania przeciwników, levelowanie, nowe umiejętności, sklepy z przedmiotami itd. ta gra nie ma nic z tego. Tylko chodzenie i skakanie i nic więcej. Sama gra wygląda jak złożona na szybko w jakimś programie do tworzenia platformówek. Dodatkowo nawet sterowanie tutaj jest nieprecyzyjne a kontakt z jakimkolwiek źródłem obrażen odpycha nas co mocno utrudnia granie.

author: {'steamid': '76561198117837119', 'num_games_owned': 3901, 'num_reviews': 178, 'playtime_forever': 204, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 204, 'last_played': 1519361031}
review:
Canyon Capers is a 2-D platformer where you go and collect certain items in each of the levels and then a vortex appears and you leave.

The gameplay is alright. The movement is okay, it can be a little finnicky at times though. The jumping is also okay, but not much variation when going with height. In each of the levels, there's different things you need to collect and then other things that you can just collect to increase your score. Each level is rated out of three stars depending on how well you did. There's a total of 50 levels in the game, so quite a bit to the game. The enemies you can bounce on and kill them. Unfortunately, if you get hit by an enemy, you get knocked back and then have an invulnerable state for a little while. First off, the knock back is really annoying because it'll push you away from where you are going, it can knock you off of a ledge, or you can fall into lava or a lava rock, both of which are instakills and it takes a little while to spawn back in. Since the levels are timed, your score gets affected by how fast you do it, so this cuts into that. The invulnerability is okay, only unless you're really trying to get those extra few points from the enemies, but then just end up screwing yourself over by getting hit by them and then you can't touch them for a few seconds. Also, the enemies respawn, which is both a good thing for points, but a bad thing for them getting in your way. Also, there's these timed bomb levels, where if you don't get to the bombs in time, they blow up and you lose the level and have to restart it all over again, which can be a pain. You can choose different characters as you unlock them. The only other character that I found more useful than Dino (the starting character that can show you where the vortex is, which can come in handy in some maze-like levels) is the other guy that has a coin magnet because it can be a real pain getting all of those coins for your extra points.

The visuals are okay and so is the audio. It's going after a kiddy-looking style to appeal to the children, so it's got that much going for it.

Overall, I've played enough of it to get a good idea of what it is. It's an alright game, but it just frustrates me trying to get all three stars in each level. Even if I weren't going for the achievements, I just don't find this game to be too much fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960275943', 'num_games_owned': 2362, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1515095041}
review:
In isolation, this game is fine. The hit detection seems a bit off, but the controls are decent. The levels are just big rooms with obstacles, but the obstacles are reasonably diverse. As an introduction to platformer type games, or for younger players, Canyon Capers is just okay.

However, there are a lot of other games out there which are more deserving of your attention. Just click the Platformer tag check out the What's Popular tab. For example:
Challenging platformers: Cuphead, or Hollow Knight.
Puzzle platformers: [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/238460/BattleBlock_Theater/]BattleBlock Theater[/url], [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/48000/LIMBO/]Limbo[/url], or [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/26800/Braid/]Braid[/url].
Retro platformers: [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/9180/Commander_Keen/]Commander Keen[/url], or [url=http://store.steampowered.com/app/15700/Oddworld_Abes_Oddysee/]Oddworld: Abe's Oddysee[/url]

Conclusion: as an adult gamer with a backlog, I wouldn't pay more than a dollar for this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198349440337', 'num_games_owned': 1619, 'num_reviews': 200, 'playtime_forever': 215, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 90, 'last_played': 1511933757}
review:
慈善包入手喜加一，而且最起码每关都能玩，没发现过不了关的硬性bug。所以给个好评。
不过我完全不觉得这个游戏有趣，后悔没有直接放到软件上挂。认为只有十个小关强迫证发作就通了没想到还有第二大关，之后实在不想玩就放弃了。
总结一下，这比起说是一个横板过关游戏不如说是一个优化路线游戏，前几条命只是为了让你记住这满屏图像都长得差不多的难记的地图，等你总结出该怎么走的时候就能通关了。其中的怪物就我玩到的来说只有鸟会把你撞离你预定的路线很讨人厌，其余的都感觉没起什么作用？还有一点应该注意的就是跳跃的时候不要把手一直按在空格上，他只会让你偏离你预想的路线不会跳得更高。
就这些吧，最后粘贴一个

author: {'steamid': '76561197992856964', 'num_games_owned': 1022, 'num_reviews': 232, 'playtime_forever': 30, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1541473585}
review:
I don't have words for how ugly this phone game is.

Bad hit detection, for both enemies and platforms.

The music's a disappointingly short loop that reminds me of a hoedown.

The level goals are unclearly phrased, and the before-level screens that contain them disappear on a timer, rather than giving you time to read (or skip!) them at your own pace.

I should have stopped at the first sentence.  Just, don't.

This is one of the games that you will endure for achievments instead of enjoying it for any reason.

author: {'steamid': '76561197974522156', 'num_games_owned': 4394, 'num_reviews': 794, 'playtime_forever': 281, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 281, 'last_played': 1505499873}
review:
Many years ago my best friends fiancé left him for a woman, this devastated him. Being the good friend I was, I dragged him out to a night club where I was trying to get him out of the suicidal depression he had fallen into.

We were drinking at a table when I noticed a very hot woman smiling at me, I noticed she was with a group of friends and she was the only one without a partner at the table. I went back to trying to make my friend have a good time, when one of the males from the table came across and told me that his girlfriends friend would like to get to know me but she's to shy to come over. 

My friend gave me a look that said oh FFS but he said "go on, I'll be ok for a little while"

Anyway I went over to say hello to the hottie and we got on really well, it was when we were on our fifth dance I looked over and saw my friends face. He looked like he was going through hell, so I had to make a decision, stay with this woman or go back to my friend.

I decided to go back to my friend, the hot woman went back to her friends and I listened to my friend question his life choices for the rest of the night.

At around 2am my friend was very drunk and I was about to get him home, when the hot woman was also leaving with her friends. She looked at me and shrugged her shoulders, I grabbed my friend and helped him to his feet. I gave her a shake of the head, she being quite drunk now walked up to me and whispered in my ear "pity as I love it in the arse" 
Then she gave me a smile and left with her friends, I dragged my friend to a cab and went home.

I have regretted that decision ever since, although not as much as deciding to buy and play this pile of shit.

author: {'steamid': '76561198111723617', 'num_games_owned': 183, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1500716562}
review:
I doubt anyone ever bought this but I'll tick the box anyway lol.

The instant this game was released it had already aged too much and it just wasn't put together well. Even if you ignore the strange graphical choices which doesn't go together well both the controls and gameplay are quite bad. The fact your character does a weird flip instead of a normal jump is just annoying and the amount of times I slipped off platforms is insane. On top of that absolutely everything gives you knockback as well which only makes some of the more annoying jumps even worse.

Other things would include the complete lack of score inside the level, in fact when you don't need to collect something to win the level it won't tell you how much you've got so its a complete mystery which is a huge red flag for me. In fact there seems to be no explanation to what things do, this includes the characters powers which is just a small picture you have to guess from. 100% not recommended especially at the current price.

author: {'steamid': '76561198074821985', 'num_games_owned': 266, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 203, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 197, 'last_played': 1455654353}
review: Canyon Capers je klasická plošinovka akú ste mohli hrať na starých konzolách. Ovládanie je na vysokej úrovní s dobrou odozvou. Grafika tiež nie je najhoršia no dalo by so to spraviť aj lepšie. Levelov je strašne veľa na mňa až príliž no fanúšikovia si pridú na svoje. Tak isto je tu aj veľa módov, čo mi k takejto plošinovke proste nesedí. Na jeden level je až príliž veľa vecí, ktoré treba nazbierať aby ste sa mohli posunúť ďalej a to tiež nie je najpraktickejšie. V celku hra nie je najhoršia no nie je podĺa môjho vkusu.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029254070', 'num_games_owned': 1209, 'num_reviews': 333, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 83, 'last_played': 1530033083}
review:
Myslę, że sporo moge powiedzieć na temat starych platformówek. Doskonale pamiętam czasy NES/SNES. Tja, przechodziłem Mario z 3 "życiami". Oczywiście było też wiele, wiele innych.
Sprawa pierwsza o której producent gry nie powiedział. Gra jak KAŻDA solidna platformówka 2D po prostu WYMAGA GAMEPADA i jednocześnie ja musiałem użyć joytokey, bo gamepada nie wykryło. Granie klawiaturą w platformówki to jak granie gamepadem w Counter-Strike za pomocą gamepada - oba rozwiązanie są równie skrajnie deiblne. Zajmuję się pecetami na codzień i doskonale wiem, że większośc graczy nie ma gamepada. Ten sam fakt tworzy masę minusów w ocenie tej gry - niesprawiedliwych minusów. Też bym dał dla Counter-Strike minusa gdybym był zmuszony grać gamepadem, to chyba logiczne.
Odciąłem więc większośc oceniających, no to lecim. "+", "-" i "=".

= dobra muzyka, monotonna, ale nie przeszkadza nawet po dłuższym czasie
+ miła dla oka grafika, w zupełności wystarczająca na platformówkę 2D
+ dobry system poruszania się
+ dobra dynamika skoków w górę
+ jest możliwość sterowania wysokością skoku (moim zdaniem to mega ważne)
- zły system skoków gdy próbujemy skoczyć tuż przy samej krawędzi - niezasłużenie spadamy choć "kroki" bohatera na to nie wskazują, oczywiście można to wyczuć, ale nadal to minus
= jest fajnie i kolorowo, lecz czasem zbyt kolorowo co może (ale nie musi) przeszkadzać
+ gra jest trudna, nie dla osób znających platformówki z telefonów które mają udowadniać jacy to jesteśmy ekstra. 
= musisz tu zapamiętać mapkę 
++ jednak wybór drogi by przejśc lub "po 3 gwiazdki" nie jest ściśle określony, bo balans gry dopuszcza pomyłki, spadnięcie ect. Gra jest trudna sama w sobie, twórcy postanowili nie zmuszać gracza do jedynej słusznej ścieżki i dać mu nieco luzu a nawet i zginąć, jest więc balans
+ jest ranking online, więc możemy śledzić swoje postępy, wbicie do pierwszych 10000 najlepszych graczy zajmie jednak nieco czasu, jak widac ludzi gra wciągnęła, a jednak chyba zapomnieli wystawić grze ocenę.
+ nawet wciąga, nie frustruje, nie denerwuje, co najwyżej zdajemy sobie sprawię że nie poznaliśmy nowego poziomu (nie dotyczy furiatów, psycholi i ludzi po dopalaczach)

Polecam poczekać na cenę około 10zł, to tylko zwykła platformówka - nie ucieknie, a jak ktoś lubi (i ma gamepada i jakiś program do niego) to jestem pewien że doceni jakość tej gry, bo to serio nie jest żaden kit zrobiony na odwal się. Bez wątpienia włożono w to kawał dobrej pracy i to widać i czuć.

author: {'steamid': '76561198031980807', 'num_games_owned': 312, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 405, 'last_played': 1508442108}
review:
Одна из самых ужасных блядских игр данного жанра. Всё вокруг тебя отталкивает туда куда не надо, неуязвимость после получения урона здесь никогда не помогает, только мешает,спрыгнуть вниз через платформу нельзя, только запрыгнуть сквозь нее. Упал в лаву, раздавило камнем - сиди жди пока магическое свечение со скоростью мертвой черепахи переместит тебя на метсо респавна. Звуковое сопровождение такое что через 5 минут ты лучше будешь наслаждаться пением бори моисеева и долбиться с ним в жопу чем слушать это дерьмо.  Переведена на много языков, в том числе и русский, переведена, конечно же, хуево.
_______________________________
Поберегите нервишки, не играйте в это дерьмо!

author: {'steamid': '76561198027267313', 'num_games_owned': 1838, 'num_reviews': 4460, 'playtime_forever': 189, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 189, 'last_played': 1495829257}
review:
Tags: Platformer
Additional Tags: Delete Local Content & Remove from Library

TLDR: Cant believe i got this in a bundle years ago and got the dlc without trying it. Its basically a sidescroll walking simulator where you gather gems. The game advertises you getting points but never shows any indication of it affecting score. Game is cheap all around, with low quality 2D sprites and a sound design that includes fart noises when you jump on ennemies. You play a slow fattie going through generic and straightforward platforms. Except when the game decides do dead end you. In level three I ended up not having any way forward either up or right (I started bottom left) I tried suiciding and I had to run into an enemy a dozen times over before I lost enough health to die. Grade A library clutter bundle shovelware mariolike derivative hogwash

author: {'steamid': '76561198018474955', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 88, 'playtime_forever': 6, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1494720368}
review:
If you're a fan of this particular retro genre (I typically am), this might appeal. Playing through a few levels, I don't see anything that's been done to modernize the game, unfortunately, so cannot recommend it.

A slider to lower SFX/Music volume was a very basic thing I missed in the game, so had to turn off the audio as I did not enjoy it at the set volume.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023659025', 'num_games_owned': 130, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1494780771}
review:
从前阿K告诉我，他从小就有一个梦想，要设计出一款好玩的游戏。
为此，他可以每天早晨四点二十起床，看API，看数据库，学习编程思想。
他放弃了工作，宅在家中，吃父母的喝女朋友的，为此也被人大骂吃软饭和废物。
阿K告诉我，有一种人是没有根的，他们的身体连接着人看不见的翅膀，随时随地都在准备着飞向天际。
地心引力也无法束缚他们。
在某个炎热的连蚊虫都纷纷掉落地面的夜晚，阿K神秘的拿出了一个U盘：“打开它，里面就是我的梦想和汗水。”
望着眼前这个闪烁着光芒的脸庞，我默默的打开了神舟K650i5d3，插入了U盘，打开。
一个名为Canyon Capers的文件夹安静的躺在其中。
三分钟之后，我的价值观改变了。
我对阿K说，熊der，我QNMLGB的吧，你还是算了吧。有一种人是没有脑子的，他们一生只有一次有脑子的时候，就是他们吹牛逼的时候。
阿K忿忿的 说：“你……你怎么能凭空侮辱人尊严。”
我从他嘴里拔出还剩一口的玉溪：“烟屁股不给你抽了。”

author: {'steamid': '76561198011595325', 'num_games_owned': 2476, 'num_reviews': 929, 'playtime_forever': 290, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 290, 'last_played': 1493782370}
review:
Canyon Capers é platform bem simples e repetitivo, basicamente você não pode realmente morrer, o objetivo é pegar os itens e sair da fase dentro de um determinado tempo. Basicamente se trata de pular e coletar gemas, as fases não são muito diferentes. O maior desafio que tive em relação ao platforming é o fato do pulo apresentar bugs e os locais de pulo são bem mal colocados. Peguei em um bundle eu acho, da pra passar um tempo, mas se você quiser gastar grana tem outros jogos do gênero MUITO melhores na steam.
------------------
Canyon Capers is very simple and repetitive platform game, basically you can not really die, the goal is to get the items and get out of the levels within a certain time. Basically it is about jumping and collecting gems, the stages are not very different. The biggest challenge I had in relation to platforming is the fact that the jump is buggy and the jump locations are poorly placed. I picked up a bundle, I think,you can to spend some time, but if you want to spend some money, there are other games of the genre that are MUCH better on steam.

author: {'steamid': '76561198317005149', 'num_games_owned': 170, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 144, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 144, 'last_played': 1656515602}
review:
喜加一系列
打了前四关，感觉难度不大，操作简单。本来想给好评。
但是第五关开始就有了变化，第五关通关门位置可能存在问题，通关门的平台靠普通方法感觉根本上不去（只有一次翻滚撞蛇复活在了平台上才进的门），不知道是不是我没有找到合适的位置，因此体验开始变差。
第六关开始地图路线相对固定(因为时间很紧)，很难拿到三星了，而且走错路基本时间不够了。
之后的关卡我暂时没有心情继续下去了。

总之，我个人的看法：

优点:
1.跳的姿势很新颖，有趣。
2.通关要求时间，具有一定挑战性。
缺点:
1.跳的判定奇怪。
2.游戏时间相对过短，游戏过于快节奏。(本身大概是休闲游戏吧，休闲游戏节奏快不是好事)
3.复活地点随机，很容易复活地点依旧有怪造成反复死亡。
4.没有地图，收集大部分道具却很难找到可能缺少道具的位置(非隐藏)
5.路线过于固定，由于追求分数三星需要更多周目，浪费时间，消磨心情。

总体，缺点过多。

author: {'steamid': '76561198049588217', 'num_games_owned': 768, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 16, 'last_played': 1599238659}

review:
Ztráta času, na Steamu najdete desítky lepších plošinovek. Špatnej level design + časovej limit je smrtelný kombo. Nepřátelé se úplně zbytečně respawnujou. Po zásahu dostanete na pár sekund nezranitelnost, ale v tomhle stavu zároveň nemůžete ani zabíjet nepřátele. To jsou základní věci co měly i 30 let starý plošinovky vyřešený líp

Jestli chcete dobrou 2D plošinovku, zkuste Spelunky

author: {'steamid': '76561198063256789', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 201, 'playtime_forever': 778, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4, 'last_played': 1482680076}
review:
Это был интересный опыт в моей жизни,
Проходить игру из разряда явных не очень хороших.
Кто бы мог знать, что игра на столько будет напоминать 
бред укурившегося человека.

Крутящийся человечек во время прыжков,
наркоманские музыкальные спец эффекты
Однотипные змеи до самого конца игры,
чёртовы 3 звезды на каждый уровень,

И весьма несложные достижения.

Не рекомендую к массовому ознакомлению к игре.

But you have infinite lives as long as time doesn't run out.  Keep trying little prince!  But hey, it's got steam cards, so sell those puppies and help fund ballistic missile research!

author: {'steamid': '76561198172925593', 'num_games_owned': 14021, 'num_reviews': 4532, 'playtime_forever': 1361, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 301, 'last_played': 1476623087}
review:
横版冒险游戏
1.生命值无限（反正我是没死光过），但被某些怪物和场景陷阱碰到后会立刻死亡（不是游戏失败，只是人物消失，但会在附近复活）
复活点是和你之前的位置有关，所以会有你刚刚千辛万苦的从下面跳到上面，死了后又重新再下面复活的可能
2.不能设置按键，移动方式是左右加空格跳跃
3.所有小怪可以被踩死，但它们和你一样，过一会儿也会复活，所以完全没有必要杀他们，非常可恶的设定是，他们的重生点固定，如果你站在那里，他们照应会重生，并且对你造成伤害
4.没有地图，导致你万一哪里漏掉了一个道具，你根本找不到！！找不到！！找不到！！
还有最后的撤离点，只有一个箭头，你跟箭头走很有可能被坑，发现你离终点只有一堵墙的距离！
5.有时间限制，一到时间就立刻失败，一失败就重新来
导致难度不低
6.第二个主角被攻击时像猪一样的叫声！！！

author: {'steamid': '76561197967685936', 'num_games_owned': 1979, 'num_reviews': 757, 'playtime_forever': 244, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 244, 'last_played': 1443556941}

author: {'steamid': '76561198138206475', 'num_games_owned': 2038, 'num_reviews': 192, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1474276604}
review:
Problemy z przełączeniem się na inne aplikacje. (alt+tab) Co za syf. W menu głównym, prawie od razu przechodzi do listy high score. Nawet nie można przyjrzeć się co jest do wyboru, bo od razu samo pokazuje ekran high score. W grze sterowanie ludzikiem złe. Do niczego ta gra. Słaba. Nie podoba mi się. 
Nie marnuj swojego czasu ani pieniędzy! 
Nie warto! 
0/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198032767895', 'num_games_owned': 2626, 'num_reviews': 81, 'playtime_forever': 1092, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1014, 'last_played': 1474051105}
review:
Od czego tu zacząć? Chyba już wiem - nie grajcie w to.

Kierujemy poszukiwaczem przygód i naszym zadaniem jest zbieranie skarbów na planszach. Zamysł dosyć dobry, bo w wielu grach to wypaliło. No w wielu, ale niestety nie w tej. Sterowanie jest słabe. Ślizgamy się po każdej powierzchni, nasze skoki są niskie. Dodam, że wiele jest tu miejsc, w których nasz skok jest idealnie wyliczony i trzeba próbować aż się uda. 

Żeby pokonać stwora, który stoi nam na drodze musimy skoczyć mu na głowę. Nie chce mi się w to wierzyć, ale nawet to skopali. Często mimo skoku na głowę, to my dostajemy obrażenia (najczęściej przy sępach). Do tego jeśli stworki najdą na siebie i wtedy na nie skoczymy, zabijamy tylko jednego, a drugi zabiera nam życie. Każdy stworek spycha nas idealnie w przepaście. Do tego trzeba dodać wkurzające nietoperze i szerszenie. Latają za nami, aż nas zepchną. Każdy stworek respi się po ok. 5 sekundach od zabicia. Tyle jest tu słabych rzeczy, że nie wiem kiedy skończę je wymieniać.

W grze występują także kamienie, piły tarczowe i topory zwisające z sufitu. Każde zabija nas od razu, nawet jeśli jesteśmy w tymczasowej nieśmiertelności, bo przed chwilą stworek zabrał nam punkty życia! Jak można zrobić coś tak chamskiego i utrudniającego grę? Wątpię żeby jakieś dziecko przeszło tę grę, sam miałem z tym wielki problem. A do dzieci przecież jest kierowana ta gra.

Po śmierci jesteśmy respawnowani w "bezpiecznym" według gry miejscu. Dlaczego napisałem to w cudzysłowiu? Hehe, dlatego, że bardzo często jesteśmy stawiani w miejscu, gdzie na przykład z sufitu zwisa topór i znowu giniemy. Bardzo dobrze rozwiązana kwestia.

Muzyka? Jest tylko 1 utwór w menu i 1 w całej grze. Pod koniec już wyciszyłem grę i słuchałem swojej muzyki, bo utwór zaimplementowany w grze jest lekko mówiąc słaby.

Jedyna rzecz jaka mnie nie odrzuciła to grafika, bo do grafiki nigdy nie przywiązywałem wagi. Jest dosyć kolorowo.

Nie polecam tej gry. Wiem, że była rozdawana za darmo, ja ją jednak kupiłem. Nie róbcie tego. Lepiej wydać to nawet na skrzynki do CS:GO.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047467577', 'num_games_owned': 285, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 11, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 11, 'last_played': 1410695454}
review:
Chocolate Chip Cookies


ZUTATEN:
280 g	Mehl
1 TL	Natron
1 TL	Salz
250 g	Butter, (weich)
190 g	Zucker
135 g	Zucker, braun
1 TL	Vanille - Extrakt od. 1 Pck. Vanillezucker
2 Ei(er)
350 g	Schokolade, zartbitter, in Stückchen gehackt


Zubereitung

Arbeitszeit: ca. 30 Min. / Schwierigkeitsgrad: normal / Kalorien p. P.: keine Angabe

Den Ofen auf 190 Grad vorheizen
Mehl, Natron und Salz in einer kleinen Schüssel mischen und beiseite stellen.
Butter, Zucker, braunen Zucker und Vanille in einer großen Schüssel cremig schlagen. Eier einzeln zugeben und jedes Mal gut unterrühren.
Die Mehlmischung portionsweise untermengen, dann Schokostückchen zufügen.
Jeweils 1 gehäuften Esslöffel Teig auf ein nicht eingefettetes Backblech setzen. 9-11 Minuten backen, bis die Cookies goldbraun sind. Weitere 2 Minuten auf dem Blech liegen lassen (noch weich), dann auf einem Kuchengitter auskühlen lassen.

Gutes Backen und Guten Apetiet

author: {'steamid': '76561197988271944', 'num_games_owned': 1346, 'num_reviews': 281, 'playtime_forever': 166, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 128, 'last_played': 1471345514}
review:
Mamma mia ragazzi, forse fino ad ora è il gioco più brutto per cui io abbia mai scritto una recensione... Che dire: Sin da subito sono rimasto impressionato (in male) dalle traduzioni dell'UI per la lingua italiana, googletranslate avrebbe sicuramente tradotto meglio; poi lo ho trovato alquanto monotono, grafica per niente curata o tantomeno piacevole, musichetta fastidiosa che ti fa venir voglia di martellarti le orecchie con dei chiodi e non meno importante, una giocabilità e meccaniche ridotte all'osso: il primo super mario era di gran lunga migliore rispetto a questo gioco che è stato rilasciato nel 2014, MA OK. In finale: SCONSIGLIATO. Io consiglierei questo gioco solo per scrivere una recensione per sconsigliarlo, fate voi.

Voto 1,5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198015225729', 'num_games_owned': 1266, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 731, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 655, 'last_played': 1464891271}
review:
Un plataformas decepcionante, tanto por su diseño gráfico, jugabilidad, diseño de niveles, etc.
Cada nivel es distinto al anterior (o lo intenta), asi que el objetivo cambia, pero en realidad es lo mismo pintado de otra manera. El juego esta traducido con el traductor de google (o uno peor), la mitad de las cosas te sangran los ojos de solo leerlas. Al principio parece hasta entretenido, pero el diseño de los niveles es tedioso y aburrido conforme avanzas.

author: {'steamid': '76561197994818580', 'num_games_owned': 438, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 143, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 20, 'last_played': 1559831415}
review:
I got this for free from a bundle, and like all games, I gave it a fair shot. I got to level 8 before the game became unbearable to play. That's right, EIGHT levels in I had to put my controller down and decide if the hours of idling would be worth it for the cards.  

It's a shallow platformer that's not very worthy to begin with before you add in floaty controls, unnecessary enemy knockback, jumps that require perfect placement or a large portion of the level must be replayed (only up to LEVEL 8, remember), backtracking through said tedious jumps because the coins you're required to collect are on 2 different paths, constantly changing objectives (one level you're collecting coins, the next they're just a bonus while you're defusing bombs, the next is just grab all chests), a bad HUD (health "bar" is a shrinking heart icon with no indicator of actual HP #'s and the timer is just a color-changing line), and pointless mechanics (losing your health just respawns you, why have timed levels, and the enemies are just roadblocks that respawn if jumped on). 

When it gets down to it, Canyon Capers is just jumping, collecting different items in linear levels, and occasionally more jumping on "baddies" that get in your way. That's it. If that's what you enjoy, fire up some NES classics and play something from the good old days that's still good. Not this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198051376939', 'num_games_owned': 817, 'num_reviews': 482, 'playtime_forever': 358, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 358, 'last_played': 1466392408}

author: {'steamid': '76561197998626524', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 139, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 139, 'last_played': 1464648799}
review:
Definitely not recommended.

The graphics and animations are hideous, ugly or nonexistent. What's up with the ridiculously fast blinking eyes in those dark caverns? And one specific cave in like, level 5 or 6 maybe, had enough of them to give someone seizures! The gameplay is far from fun, some enemies are just unfair or broken (like the homing bats) and a tiny mistake can cost you the whole level (like the one with homing bats; the whole level was a really weird and out-of-place difficulty ramp, really).

It feels like a 90's game, and even then it doesn't really have anything to it. Definitely not recommended. If you want a good platformer with the same look (or, well, better look, really), go play Commander Keen series, the older Duke Nukem games, or Crystal Caves. Way more fun, and still pretty challenging, but for better reasons.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054902790', 'num_games_owned': 864, 'num_reviews': 105, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1402516464}
review:
Plutôt sympa sur son concept de niveaux fermés et de récolte d'objets le tout dans un objectif de Scoring, ce jeu ne m'a pas convaincu. Rien de nouveau sous le soleil mais ce qui me gêne vraiment c'est cette impression que le jeu a été bâclé (bruitages, musique, traduction...). J'aimais bien la possibilité de débloquer de nouveaux personnages disposant chacun d'un radar affichant la direction à prendrer pour récolter un certain type d'objets. Même en restant très classique, avec quelques petits ajouts supplémentaires comme des compétences différentes pour les personnages ou un mode multijoueurs, ce jeu aurait pu facilement me séduire. Malheureusement il n'en est rien à cause d'une réalisation trop faible et un manque d'idées, dommage.

Test complet : http://aquab0n.fr/2014/06/test-canyon-capers.html

author: {'steamid': '76561198048825498', 'num_games_owned': 569, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 402, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 402, 'last_played': 1458137470}
review:
Juego de plataformas muy sencillo en aspecto y control, en el cual tenemos que coger todos los objetos que nos pidan dentro de un tiempo límite. Los objetivos pueden varias en cuanto a lo que hay que recolectar: coger gemas, cofres, explotar bombas, etc.

La traducción es de las más lamentables que he visto en mucho tiempo, sacadas prácticamente del traductor de google...con razón hay 8 idiomas disponibles para elegir.

Podemos ir desbloqueando varios personajes conforme avancemos en la aventura, algo que le da un poquito de estrategia al juego, ya que dependiendo del personaje, tendremos una habilidad u otra (posibilidad de ver gemas, inmunes al fuego, etc).

La jugabilidad es extremadamente sencilla: únicamente tenemos un botón para saltar. La precisión de los saltos es buena, si bien los respawn muchas veces carecen de sentido, e incluso a veces reaparecemos encima de algún enemigo y nos matan sin poder remediarlo.

El aspecto gráfico, siguiendo la línea de lo comentado antes, es también muy sencillote y para mi gusto bastante feo: la paleta de colores es siempre la misma, los fondos son prácticmante iguales, los mundos son extremadamente parecidos a pesar de ambientarse en otros "países", y el diseño del protagonista y los enemigos es mediocre, sin más.

En cuanto a su dificultad, pasarse cada nivel sin más pretensiones que esa no es muy difícil, pero conseguir todos los objetivos en todos los niveles, sobre todo a partir del mundo 4, es muy complicado, hasta el punto de llegar a la frustración, ya que es a veces parece que los enemigos y rocas aparecen de la nada, justo cuando tú cruzas y sin apenas darte cuenta. Muchas veces ocurre la sensación de que no has merecido morir, pero por "azares" del juego lo has hecho, y eso es lo que hace que poco a poco lo vayas dejando, por lo cansino que resulta.

En definitiva, un juego que no está mal, en el cual puedes pasar unos ratos de entretenimiento decentes, pero que con el paso de los niveles y los mundos va haciéndose muy pesado, "gracias" a unos mundos extrañamente similares, una jugabilidad muy sencilla sin más posibilidades que la de saltar y una dificultad mal calibrada.

Recomendado para jugarlo un par de horas.... o menos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198018112259', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 2199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1835, 'last_played': 1457747131}
review:
This game is frustrating as fudge.  I hate the boulders and spiky objects that one-shot you.  I hate that the falling spikes can sometimes kill you when you stand above them.  I hate when enemies bounce you into said one shotting obstacles.  I Hate That The Tooltip Before You Start A Level Looks Like This.  I hate the stupid bouncing sound everytime you jump.  I hate that enemies respawn in 5 seconds, especially those mosquitos.  I hate how amateur the game looks for a 2014 game.    I hate that you can't kill enemies during the invulnerability.  I hate that a lot of later levels are earlier levels with a different background and a few extra platforms.  I hate that I still have no idea what collecting the floating hearts does, or why golden snails are the game's special item du jour.  I hate that I'm still finishing this game because I'm a masochist.  I hate the game's annoying music.  I even hate that the game's name sounds like a Donkey Kong Country level ripoff.  I hate that this game is retro but only in the worst possible ways - bad design, bad graphics, bad music, bad controls, bad sound effects, bad enemies, bad obstacles, bad characters, bad objectives, bad likeness to level settings.

Other than that, I really loved the game.  ^_^

review:
Endiabladamente dificil, cuesta pasar los 50 niveles con las estrellas que piden, sobre todo por el mal control del personaje, es un reto acabarlo, perdi ganas de conseguir los pocos logros que faltaron al requerir mas perfeccion.

review: Starts as some average to play platformer only to end, after few levels, to being a really boring game. Jumping animation is bad, you can't land where you really want to, you can't proper jump on enemy heads because you could few pixels off so they will hit you instead. I played it only because got it for free, I wouldn't buy it even at 90% off.

review:
Jogo de Puzzles, estilo arcade e com conquistas muito boas!

É um tanto quanto viciante, fazendo com que você queira avançar sempre mais um level, zerar todas as fazes com o máximo de estrelas e pegar todos os ítens especiais. Indicado pra quem quer passar um tempo com um jogo de raciocínio e habilidade, bem como melhorar sua rapidez em realizar tarefas e matar os inimigos.

Ótimo em conquistas, perfeito para quem gosta de jogos de plataforma.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970314107', 'num_games_owned': 2304, 'num_reviews': 917, 'playtime_forever': 59, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1453490539}
review:
If you want to make a game that's just about collecting things, that's fine. There are certainly quality games with simpler premises than that. But if you're not going to go deep on gameplay, you need to go hard on the polish and the feel. A coin collecting game in this day and age needs to be the most incredible, mind-blowing coin collector in the world to make it worth your time. And that makes a pretty good segue into the mess that is Canyon Capers.

You play Dino, a dopey little fellow with an Alfalfa part and the loudest shoes imaginable. He's here to plod across simple levels in search of gems, coins, chests, food, or all four. The first thing you will surely notice is how impossibly ugly this game is. I can't even try to be nice about it, because every level is a trainwreck of sprites and colors. For some reason nothing is rendered at the same resolution, so you might have a photo-realistic tiki mask sitting atop a 16-bit tuft of grass. Not even Dino and the hapless creatures you goomba-stomp (with a farting noise, no less) match. The colors are also rich and garish, clashing against each other and making it impossible to know what is foreground, background, passable, and solid.

Even if the game weren't hideous, the absolutely tepid gameplay would drive you away after only a handful of levels. Every stage is just about collecting things, with no gimmicks or bonus stages to break up the monotony. Sometimes it's one kind of treasure, sometimes it's all four, sometimes it's ticking time bombs, and sometimes it's all optional on the way to the exit. Without exception, you will always be collecting something before reaching the exit. There are no powerups to hasten your lazy stride or let you jump higher than your normal, awkward somersault. Stomping enemies doesn't even gain you anything besides points, because they respawn seconds later.

That reminds me of one of my favorite parts of Canyon Capers, getting constantly hit by strangely unavoidable enemies. Taking damage makes you invincible for a few seconds but also makes you pass through enemies, so you have to stay well away until it wears off. Dying just respawns you nearby, and can absolutely spawn you inside a monster to get hit. Slow enemies are often set in caves where the ceilings are too low to jump them. And even if you come to grips with your awful foes, levels are laid out with ideal paths that make backtracking to collect missed items extremely time-consuming.

There are additional characters to unlock with different passive abilities, but they're specific to one kind of treasure and you don't know what kind you're collecting until you start the level. It's such a simple thing, but emblematic of the shortcomings which riddle Canyon Capers. The game feels like someone's first experiment with GameMaker, slipshod designs and artless aesthetics and all. It's absolutely beyond me to imagine anyone deriving any sort of enjoyment from this game, between its horrifying graphics and infuriating levels.



Did you enjoy this review? I certainly hope so, and I certainly hope you'll check out more of them at https://goldplatedgames.com/ or on my [url=http://steamcommunity.com/groups/audish#curation]curation page[/url]!

author: {'steamid': '76561198046283458', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 296, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 296, 'last_played': 1454099520}
review: A poorly-designed platformer with garish graphics and unintuitive controls and hitboxes. Canyon Capers is not engaging enough to be played for more than a few hours and is certainly not worth its price. It can be entertaining for a little while, but overall does not keep one's attention for long.

author: {'steamid': '76561198091388549', 'num_games_owned': 453, 'num_reviews': 103, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 43, 'last_played': 1525190342}
review:
Canyon Capers- 2D stworzone przez Crazy Moo Games. W grze zbieramy kryształy, które są niezbędne, by przejść do następnego poziomu. Początkowy bohater- Dino, ma według mnie dość dziwną osobowość, gdyż morduje swoich wężowatych przeciwników...bąkami. Gierka ma przyjemny klimacik, a jej grupa docelowa to dzieci rozpoczynające naukę w szkole podstawowej, ze względu na czas ograniczający całą zabawę.

PLUSY:
-Ładne 2D
-Bohater z... interesującą osobowością 
-Zachęcające do gry, łatwe osiągnięcia z miłymi tekścikami

MINUSY:
-Jak dla dzieci może okazać się nieco przytrudna

PODSUMUJĄC:
Canyon Capers to dobry tytuł dla początkujących graczy. Po kilku usprawnieniach może być to idealna gra na pierwsze kroki z wirtualną rzeczywistością.

OCENA:9/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198022934423', 'num_games_owned': 1215, 'num_reviews': 86, 'playtime_forever': 609, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 609, 'last_played': 1450925054}
review:
Juego patrocinado por el traductor de Google (no es coña,están sacadas las traducciones de ahí).Preprárate para recorrer 50 maravillosos niveles,todos ellos con los mismos escenarios y los mismos objetivos.
Entre ellos se encuentran los enemigos : serpientes,ratas,buitres,murciélagos,avispas y bichos saltarines deformes.Todos colocados con la más mala leche posible : seguramente si pueden darte un golpe,empujarte por 30 metros y lanzarte hacia la muerte,lo harán;los voladores todos atraviesan texturas,y te persiguen medio mapa o vuelan de forma errática y pareciendo haberse metido unas pocas rayas de algo malo.
A continuación tenemos el spawn,que te manda a donde le de la gana el juego,cuanto más lejos mejor,y el de los enemigos,que es de unos 10 segundos o menos.
Luego tenemos las trampas : Hachas colgantes,mazas que aplastan,rocas rodantes,sierras,lava...que con rozarte ya te puedes ir a la otra punta del mapa,y muchas veces jodiéndote el spawn (en el último nivel hay una que,si mueres en ella,spawnearás justo debajo y morirás de nuevo eternamente,ojito).Mención especial a las bolas rodantes que muchas veces spawnean encima tuya sin posibilidad de hacer nada,o las bolas de lava que parecen tener vida propia y te golpean lanzándote a la lava que finalmente te mata.
En último lugar nos encontramos a los personajes desbloqueables,que no son más que el primero pero con unos pocos cambios a la skin.
En resumen,un juego que sacará lo peor de ti,hay pocos que acaben con mi paciencia,y este es uno de ellos.Y en vez de traducir de Google,es mucho mejor dejarlo en inglés directamente,al menos no queda tan cutre.
GG programadores,gg...

author: {'steamid': '76561198031261101', 'num_games_owned': 2317, 'num_reviews': 143, 'playtime_forever': 291, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 291, 'last_played': 1449249283}
review:
||Pros||
*None. There are better platformers to scratch your itch.

*Though I did get 5 achievements for beating the first stage!
..All I got for beating the next few was a headache. :(


||Cons||
*Character jumps like throwing up one of the old, bulky, imbalanced TV remotes, but at a more glacial pace.
Jump is short, there's no double-jump, there's no vertical movement downward through platforms.
Combine that with the jump handling, and expect to keep being sabotaged by the game controls.

*Gameplay is generic, with the collection mechanics of sonic games combined with the platforming of mario games, but with generic, uninteresting levels and terrible handling.

*Art is far worse than it appears in the screenshots. Very grainy, similar colors bleed together.

*Hitbox detection on enemies seems to be off- or maybe it's just another quirk of the terrible tumbling short jump, and you not managing to get the height or angle the game would require to register  proper hit.

*While early stages have you nearly immortal and thus the control frustrations are managable, looking at the screenshots with the handling in mind, I can only imagine later stages to be infuriatingly stressing.

*Don't expect even a basic tutorial- not even to tell you what basic movement keys are.


||Bonus: Pros according to the more helpful other reviews||
*Unlockable Characters
*Unlockable Abilities
*Plays better with a controller
*Doesn't actually slowly descend your soul into a realm of eternal torment [i](Unconfirmed)[/i]

Hop around a stage, collect poorly hidden secrets and a slew of gems and coins, try desperately to clumsily circle around platforms or get the right angle to actually land on an enemy's head..

If it wasn't so painful to play, it'd honestly just be boring with its blandness. 

I just can't recommend this game at all.

1/5

author: {'steamid': '76561198049498441', 'num_games_owned': 5262, 'num_reviews': 444, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 250, 'last_played': 1445613117}
review:
아 제발 제 평가 목록에서 비추천 나오는 소리 좀 안나게 해주세요.

또 제 라이브러리 게임 한번씩 다 해보겠다는 제 의지를 꺾는 강인한 아이가 한명 나타났네요.
왠만한 플렛포머 게임은 고인돌마냥 원시인 때려잡고 맛있는 음식 먹으면서 점수 올리는거,
딱 그거 밖에 없잖아요. 뭐 스토리? 있음 좋죠. 그래픽? 눈 아프지만 않으면 돼죠!
그렇잖아요! 
간단하게 몇판 즐기는거 그거 참 재미있었죠.

소닉은 속도감이 매우 통쾌했어요.
연습만 좀 해서 손만 안 꼬이게 하게 되면 최강의 스피드를 느낄 수 있었어요.
호쾌한 BGM은 말할 것도 없구요.

플렛포머 최강 강자 마리오도 먹는건 동전밖에 없었지만
3스테이지 이상 가면 무지 어려웠던거 빼면 진짜 다 재미있었다구요.

근데 이 게임은 소닉의 뭐 링도 아니고 동전도 아니고
스케일부터가 다른 보석과 보물상자를 먹게 하는건데도 왜이렇게 박진감이 없죠.

일단 캐릭터부터 구려요.
대체 뭘 만든거예요?
도트로 만든 젤다도 이거보단 이뻐요.
꼴에 캐릭터 선택창이 있는데 캐릭터들 언락을 해도 이것과 비등비등할거 같은 느낌이예요.
그리고 맵은 또 왜이리 플랫은 많은데 막상 밟고서 쉽게 올라갈 수 있는게 없죠?

보석을 다 모아야 다음 판으로 갈 수 있는데 보석을 다 먹다가 실수해서 밑으로 떨어졌어요.
그래요 그것 까지는 좋죠.
근데 올라가는 건 쉽게 만들어줘야하는거 아닌가요?
아니면 이건 어때요?
떨어지면 못 올라오는데 이 게임이 시간제한이라는 좆같은 룰이 있어서
처음부터 루트를 잘 짤 수 있도록 유저 인터페이스에 전체 맵을 올려놓는거예요.

그렇게 되면 떨어지더라도 올라갈 수 있다 없다를 판단이라도 하던가 최단 루트라도 짤 거 아니예요.


이건 게이머들 자체에게 알아서 주는 대학 과제같은 게임이네요.
교수가 갑자기 들어와서 1일 과제를 내주는데 뭐 뭐라해야하냐 그 어떤 물건으로 그림을 그리래요.
근데 그 물건 구할 수 있는 방법이 거의 전무해요.
근데 제출일이 내일이래요?
근데 이걸 어떻게 해야하냐고 어디서 이 물건을 구해야하냐 물어봐도 알아서 하래요.



딱 이 게임 수준이 여기 까집니다.

아 여기 게임을 만들었어. 자 이제 해봐...

어 저기요. 이거 너무 맵이 복잡하구요. 몹이 계속 리스폰 되는데다가,
제 점프는 왜 자꾸 포물선으로 빙빙 돌아가지고 플랫 아래에서 몹에 살짝 닿았는데도 데미지가 들어가죠?

그건 모르겠고, 난 일단 게임을 만들었잖아. 그게 중요한거 아니야? 이제 이 게임을 7달러 주고 사라고!


딱 이 수준인거예요. 



점프도 구리고. 몹도 구리고. 몹은 왜 리스폰하는지도 모르겠고.. 난점 투성이예요.
뭐 이 게임에다가 퍼즐요소를 넣고싶은 이 제작진들의 마음은 알거같지만
저희는 점프하고 점수올리고 적피하는 간단한 게임을 좋아하지
난간에서 떨어져가지고 점프가 안 닿는 플랫 위로 올라가려고 애쓰면서
보물을 무작정 다 모아야 담판으로 넘어갈 수 있는 게임을 원하는건 아니거든요.
그것도 시간제한 있는 그런거는 더 싫구요.


점수제로 별 세개 나눠서 등급 주는 것도 앵그리버드 외에는 싫어해요.
정말 싫어요. 게임을 깼다는 사실에 집중해야지 왜 점수에 별을 더 측정해가지고 찝찝함을 유발시키죠?
복고풍 게임이라면서 왜 그런걸 넣었나요?
소닉에 그런게 있나요? 젤다는요? 마리오는요?없어요!
게임에 스테이지 깼다 와 대단해요 짝짝! 조금 일찍 들어오셨네요! 보너스 점수 드릴게요!
이게 있는거 뿐이지
어.. 스테이지 클리어 하셨네요. 아 근데 점수 좀 부족하셔서요.. 어 .. 제 점수는요.. 별 두개입니다. 헤헿.
이러는게 게임성이 좀 더 좋아질 것 같나요? 별로요.


아 그리고 하나더요.
빛효과 좀 빼요.
보석이랑 트랩같은거 눈부신거 알겠으니까 움직일때 마다 뭐 그거 태양 눈에 부셔가지고
빛 분자 여러개로 막 빤짝 하고 반사되는거 있잖아요.
흔히 애니메이션 사막같은 곳에서 태양 표현할 때 쓰는 그 표현 있잖아요.
그걸 꼭 굳이 넣으셔야했어요?
퀄리티 그런에만 높이면 뭐해요.
그것도 3D게임도 아니고 플랫 포머게임이라서 점프하나하나 1픽셀 1도트에 신경써야하는데
그거 점프 뛸때마다 엄청 신경 쓰인다구요..

점프도 븅신같이 뛰어가지고 캐릭터들은 한 스테이지 뛰고나면 먹은거 토하게 생겼어요.

author: {'steamid': '76561197990977338', 'num_games_owned': 2791, 'num_reviews': 82, 'playtime_forever': 124, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1497275956}
review:
Offensively mediocre.

Not horrible in any single aspect, but this game somehow manages to be less than the sum of its parts. 

Some graphics scale awkwardly, making them blurry. The game feels like a mobile port. There are really annoying, unskippable animations. The game feels very unresponsive in the menus. The style isn't consistent at all.

But worst of all, it's just plain not fun. It feels like a chore.

I do like the little lens flare effect the gems give off and the flip-jump thing. If only that little attention to detail would've been carried over to the UI, level design and overall polish, Canyon Capers could've been a pretty okay game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198088391955', 'num_games_owned': 722, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 120, 'last_played': 1433717147}
review:
Esse é um jogo de plataforma onde você deve pular de uma base a outra para pegar os objetos, pular em cima dos inimigos para mata-los, tudo isso dentro de um tempo. E é ai que ele falha.

Num jogo onde o pulo é essencial, porque cargas d’agua ele não funciona direito? Muitas vezes você não consegue passar pelas fases porque não acerta a plataforma apenas por estarem mal posicionadas e as fases terem tempo para concluir, frustrando bastante apenas porque você não consegue acertar os pulos.

Sério, não vale a pena comprar isso daí nem em promoção.

author: {'steamid': '76561198036403541', 'num_games_owned': 690, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 62, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1437715020}
review:
I don't know what it is about this game that I find so unpleasant.
 
Could it be the graphics that remind me of cheap kids birthday party accessories. 

That when the character jumps he spins, albeit there are unlockable characters, I just couldn't be bothered.

Or could it be that the game is not about exploration just jumping around collecting gems in same same looking boxed environments.

I think its the fact that so much work has been put into this game, it seems really polished. It's polished like a tasteless aunties collection of porcelain girl and boy shelf figures. They'll never go on antiques roadshow, they're ugly and they're tacky, but your aunty with the blue hair and voice that grates on your ears love them.

I love Risk of Rain, a game, where you jump around limited environments, collecting stuff and unlocking characters. Sounds similar, it's just that, that game doesn't have a visual style I find nauseating.

I think I'll recommend this game, not because I like it, because we need different tastes, and we need that tacky aunty, with porcelain puppy dogs on her mirror shelves or whatever.

So if you like the visual style, what you'll get it a decent polished game.
