author: {'steamid': '76561197984322112', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 516, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 516, 'last_played': 1417900590}
review:
Need an option between recommend and no recommend. This game is not great, and it not terrible. It is somewhat interesting though dose nothing unique, you either collect a an item, and others are for higher score, collect bombs in a certain order before a short timer runs out, or collect all 4 type of items to open 4 doors. 

Having health is pointless, only in a couple maps I had to try not to get hurt to get 3 stars, others it made it easier to get hurt (you get a few second invulnerablity). a few things kill you instantly, game often put you right on an enime or swinging axe you you die again right away.

If some flaws in a game make you angry, I would skip this. If you like achievements, this one is easy to get all the achievements. I would rate it 5/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964410359', 'num_games_owned': 5234, 'num_reviews': 273, 'playtime_forever': 254, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 254, 'last_played': 1413782663}
review:
Canyon Capers est probablement le jeu recordman des jeux qui ont été le plus distribués gratuitement à travers des bundles, celà pose de sérieux doutes sur sa qualité. 
Qu'est-ce qui lève les doutes ? Jouer à Canyon Capers... 
Le gameplay tourne autour du fait d'évoluer dans des niveaux au design chiant avec un perso qui a la maniabilité d'un rocher pour ramasser le plus de merdouilles possibles cachées aux 4 coins de la zone, des pièces, des fruits, des diamants, des coffres, ou bien désamorcer d'occasionelles bombes tout en sautant sur la tête de tout le bestiaire avec ses sprites hideux (serpents, abeilles, rats, poissons, tout est moche). 
Si vous faites un assez bon score sur le niveau, vous obtenez des étoiles, et si vous avez assez d'étoiles dans une zone, vous débloquez la zone suivante, et vous avez le plaisir de pouvoir continuer à refaire toujours la même chose dans des niveaux qui veulent de plus en plus vous pousser à bout. 
On attend avec impatience la fin, mais ça ne semble jamais se finir, les niveaux continuent d'arriver puisqu'il y a 5 stages de 10 niveaux à terminer, et que tous ces niveaux sont intégralement basés sur le même gameplay dépendant de cette maniabilité terrifiante. 
On débloque bien quelques persos avec un "pouvoir" supplémentaire ici et là, pouvoir qui se résume pour la plupart à vous filer un radar pour un seul type d'objet/merdouille à ramasser, afin d'abréger un peu vos souffrances. 
Le jeu est donc définitivement mauvais, ce qui n'est pas exactement une nouvelle fraiche, étant donné qu'il était le remake d'un très vieux jeu de l'époque DOS/Amiga qui était déjà très mauvais à l'époque, et que le travail fait sur le portage n'a absolument pas essayé d'améliorer tous les défauts du jeu, ce qui aurait été infiniment plus utile que d'ajouter des achievements steam et des trading cards.

Quanto ao preço não posso falar muito pois ganhei a key do game, mas o jogo vale a aquisição se estiver abaixo de R$: 5,00.

Não espere nada alem dos desafios de um puzzle, pois é somente isso que ele oferece.

author: {'steamid': '76561197996459944', 'num_games_owned': 1038, 'num_reviews': 115, 'playtime_forever': 369, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 369, 'last_played': 1416312228}
review:
jeu de plateforme ou l'on doit récupérer tous les items demandés. marrant 5 minutes, avec une bonne prise en main, mais les graphismes  sans âme, la musique infecte et l'obligation de refaire certains niveaux finis (en gros, pour passer d'un monde a l'autre, il faut réussir les niveaux avec un certain nombre de points, si ce n'est pas suffisant, obligation de refaire le niveau, un procédé artificiel qui a prouvé a mainte reprise que c'etait une tres mauvaise idée) vont avoir raison de votre patience. 
noter petit personnage peut mourir autant de fois qu'il veut dans les niveaux mais le décès fait perdre du temps. Et bien entendu, une fois le temps fini, pouf, on est bon pour recommencer. Ca ne serait pas handicapant si les developpeurs n'avaient pas profiter de se pretexte pour mettre des ennemis partout, notamment a des endroits ou l'on est obligé de se faire toucher, sans parler des pierres qui vont tombent sur le coin de la tronche sans aucune possibilité d’esquive. bref, canyon capers est frustrant et sans personnalité. distrayant a petite dose, mais on n'y reviendra pas... et ce système de points pour débloquer les niveaux suivant : carton rouge

author: {'steamid': '76561198027872861', 'num_games_owned': 1356, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 199, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31, 'last_played': 1415932538}
review:
I wish there was an option to give a neutral review....

Not the most spirited way to start off reviewing a game, but I figure, no use beating around the bush.

This game is not bad..necessarily; and it's not unoriginal either...again, necessarily.  However, the game feels like bonus stage from the SNES days gone wrong, pitting you in a semi-small playing field with baddies as obstacles, where it is your objective to collect coins, gems, and or treasure chests, all while racing against the clock, jumping from platforms and structures in platformer perguatory.  

Currently, I have not played through much of the game, but from the 6-7 levels I have completed, they all feel the same in a copy/paste then edit sorta feel.  It truly is a different type of platformer, at least to me, but I can't say after several levels I am truly compelled to continue forward.  That being said, I have been wrong about games before by judging them too quickly, so I feel like I owe the developers at least a fair playthrough of the full first world before speaking ill of their product.

That being the case, I give my vote to recommend, at least till I give it a full fair shot.

review:
Confusing textures, really annoying music, turned off the music right when I heard it for a few minutes. Levels were Mario style, got 3 stars in levels like Angry Birds. Levels aren't that bad, overall, if you keep up with the textures, they are fun to play. They could have made the game physics better, IMO.
Overall, enjoyable when you have time to kill. Not worth the money, but, not a bad game either.

Oh, it has Trading Cards which is nice, as well. So that's a hefty bonus and a pro if you think about it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054894220', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 39, 'playtime_forever': 88, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 7, 'last_played': 1428430979}
review: This game is only for true hardcore gamers. Stay away if you're used to casual toilet games like Deus Ex or ArmA. This is a real, hardcore, thought provoking game that requires intense strategy and foresight that the human brain completely and utterly lacks. This is the kind of game Steven Hawkin would have a hard time with. The only game series that is more thought provoking and strategetic than this is the Leap Frog series... That's how hard this is. I only recommend this if you have a lot of time on your hands and look forward to investing lots of time thinking and planning out your every move.

[h1]In-Depth:[/h1]
Canyon Capers is quite a below-average platformer. Graphics aren't "retro", they're plain bad, as they couldn't do anything better. Music and especially SFX are annoying and there are gamebreaking bugs. The map layouts and designs are boring. Why the 6€ price tag, with a 2€ DLC? I don't know.

author: {'steamid': '76561198125177610', 'num_games_owned': 754, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6, 'last_played': 1425481274}
review:
Сегодня ты играешь в этот трэш, а завтра свою маму съешь.

А если серьезно, то уже в далеком 2014 году я попробовал поиграть в это исчадие геймдизайна. Кроме неудобства игры и негативных эмоций я ничего не получил. 
Это одна из тех игр, которая мало-мальски пытается быть увлекательным инди платформером. На деле он просто ужасен. Убогая механикой, большой lag input - это и много другое напрочь мешает вам управлять персонажем, чувствовать его инерцию и понимать пространственное перемещение.

author: {'steamid': '76561198029140502', 'num_games_owned': 712, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 111, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 111, 'last_played': 1415643627}
review:
As soon as I turned on this game and saw logo, I knew it's gonna be bad. Main menu music only confirmed my supposition.

- graphic is awful, looks worse than on screenshots, I really think I saw better looking games on NES
- music is annoying
- jumping is a joke, you're never sure if you jump over to next platform or not
- oh, you didn't reach it? Run through whole level again
- and once you run the same path for the fifth time remember that you have limited time! Nice, isn't it?
- every level objectives are "collect tons of stuff and go to exit"
- enemies renew themselves after like three seconds
- using alt+tab will cause a serious technical problems making this game unplayable and almost impossible to shut down

Pros? I got it for free and got cards, including my first foil card.

Please, save yourself the time and don't play this game. Really.

review:

author: {'steamid': '76561197965680285', 'num_games_owned': 939, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 126, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 126, 'last_played': 1415574661}
review:
Got it free and I still feel like I paid to much. This game sucks so bad I want to find a way to remove it from my steam list. They should be paying me for the time I spent in this game. In fact if you want to obtain the same experience as playing this game for 0.7 hours just hit yourself in the skull and crotch at the same time for that amount of time and you'll be close.

- Terrible Graphics (not retro just terrible)
- Terrible Controls
- Later levels have objectives that are near impossible (not completely, but close enough to make you say "fuck this game")
- Music is like nails on a chalkboard
- The "auto-jump if the button is being held" is counter to every single platformer on the market where holding the button makes you jump higher. This means when you hold the button expecting to jump higher you instead instantly jump once you land causing you usually to kill yourself. 
- There is no "jump higher" and there are ledges that are like a millimeter too high and force you to retrace the entire level to hopefully make a jump ... if you don't be prepared to travel the whole level again.
- All those annoyances are thrown into a game where each level has a very short time limit. So you feel rushed and frustrated from the second you begin playing.

Just avoid this game like the plague ... if you have the chance to get it for free, treat it like you would "Free Herpes."

author: {'steamid': '76561198032643719', 'num_games_owned': 1210, 'num_reviews': 131, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 109, 'last_played': 1415484284}
review:
[code]NIE BÓJMY SIĘ CZYTANIA! DBAJMY O JĘZYK![/code]

Canyon Capers to [b]gra platformowa utrzymana w klimatach retro.[/b]
Skaczemy po kolejnych etapach, zbierając monety i naskakując na przeciwników, aby ich zlikwidować.

Lata temu uruchomiłem ten tytuł, aby zdobyć karty Steam. Ciężko było nie żałować tej decyzji.

Bez względu na Wasze zamiłowanie do takich tytułów, w tym przypadku czekają na Was [b]tragiczne problemy techniczne.[/b]
Na skutek tego, że zminimalizowałem i włączyłem grę ponownie, zdublował się kursor.
Mogłem poruszać jedynie Windowsowym kursorem, a ten z gry w tym czasie klikał w pozycje z opcjami, włączając i wyłączając ich zakładkę.
Gry nie dało się zminimalizować, żadne skróty klawiszowe nie działały.
Zostałem zmuszony to ponownego uruchomienia całego komputera.
[b]Optymalizacja na medal.[/b]

Tytuły takie jak Canyon Capers widzieliśmy dwadzieścia lat temu w tak zwanych "grach flashowych", uruchamianych z poziomu przeglądarki. Gra nie oferuje niczego czym mogłaby się wyróżnić, oprawa graficzna jest zwykła, a wręcz [b]sztuczna i odpychająca.[/b]
Ścieżka dźwiękowa należy do kategorii irytujących, a mechanika rozgrywki jest powtarzalna i nie przynosi żadnej radości z gry.

[b]Gry nie polecam nikomu, nie nadaje się nawet dla dzieci, gdyż jest zbyt nieprzystępna w swoim sterowaniu.[/b]

Jest to niestety kolejny przykład tego, że Steam dba wyłącznie o liczbę dostępnych tytułów, a nie o ich jakość.

- Bunshiin


[code] Jeżeli recenzja Ci się podobała, przekaż mi to proszę, wciskając "OBSERWUJ" na prowadzonym przeze mnie Kuratorze, gdzie znajdziesz moje pozostałe recenzje.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033663691', 'num_games_owned': 140, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 809, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 809, 'last_played': 1415119922}
review:
Crazy Moo Games' "Canyon Capers'' is like an erotic daydream about chances missed and opportunities avoided and springed. For its hero, who spends several nights wandering in the sexual underworld, which are the 5 ancient worlds, it's all foreplay. He never actually has the 'treasure', secretly meaning sex, but he dances close, and holds its hand in the flame. Why does he do this? The easy answer is that the beauty of the gems has made him jealous. Another possibility is that the story it tells inflames his rather torpid imagination.

The game has the structure of a thriller, with the possibility that conspiracies and murders have taken place. It also resembles a nightmare; a series of strange characters drift in and out of focus, puzzling the hero with unexplained details of their lives. The reconciliation at the end of the game is the one scene that doesn't work; a film that intrigues us because of its loose ends shouldn't try to tidy up.

You play as an anonymous man, possibly has a wife and would therefore be a married couple who move in rich Manhattan society. In a long, languorous opening sequence, they attend a society ball where a tall stone, a parody of a suave seducer, tries to honey-talk the wife of the anonymous man. Meanwhile, the anonymous man gets a come-on from two aggressive and beautiful gems, before being called to the upstairs bathroom, where Victor, the millionaire who is giving the party, has a gem who needs a gemologist's help, and that's where everything starts tearing apart in the sick world that Canyon Capers is in.

author: {'steamid': '76561198104664988', 'num_games_owned': 158, 'num_reviews': 22, 'playtime_forever': 134, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 134, 'last_played': 1415244399}

author: {'steamid': '76561198045534557', 'num_games_owned': 222, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2696, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 233, 'last_played': 1595892851}
review:
Considering I have now collected 100% of the achievements in this game, have collected every item, and have gained the maximum amount of stars in every single level of every single world, I feel that I am qualified to give an opinion on this game.

My summary is: It is terrible. Don't buy it. If you received a free copy of the game, delete it. Do not give Moo Cow Games any sign that you in any way might support them. Canyon Capers has awful controls, stupid music, and boring, repetitive gameplay. It looks and plays like a hardly-tested flash game by an amateur. The levels have no depth to them, just a bunch of annoying platforming (and I love platforming games, but Canyon Capers manages to make it a hair-pulling chore).

The animation is terrible. Everything looks like it was made by and for little kids and the sprites for the main characters specifically hardly even *have* any animations (they jump by slowly SPINNING their sprite in the air!). Everything about this game just sucks. Please avoid it.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011478984', 'num_games_owned': 2007, 'num_reviews': 217, 'playtime_forever': 210, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1466230370}
review:
it will be better if it support Chinese.
类似 马力欧一样的平台跳跃游戏，但是显然不是那么有趣。跳跃的感觉比较僵硬，有点fc恶魔城的感觉。
主角偏胖呢，落地的位置比较难判断，有时候明明站在水管边缘了，结果还是掉下去了。
逃脱门的位置经常是比较恶心的位置，另外都没有提示，还得满地图的找。

author: {'steamid': '76561198136224207', 'num_games_owned': 115, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 68, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 60, 'last_played': 1415898633}
review:
Me ha cambiado la vida. Es algo así como el juego perfecto.
Su irónica representación de la realidad simula el esperpento de Valle-Inclán de una forma mucho más refinada.
Cuesta darse cuenta de que el juego es perfecto. Al principio, parecerá un ñordo más grande que Windows Vista, pensarás que no vale ni para limpiarse el ojete, pero tras analizarlo, nos damos cuenta de lo que representa en realidad. 
Esos sprites mal recortados que te hacen perder cada vez que un bicho-mierda no te toca, con majestuosidad representan la dureza de la vida. ¿Qué es, sino innovación en el arte, y culminación en su excelencia, la increíble manera en que saltan los personajes, esos personajes que no representan sino la más burda fealdad del ser humano e inhumano?
¿Y esas serpientes con más parecido a un truño que la cara de Gurruño?
¿Y esas monedas que al caer rebotan sobre el vacío?
Y la traducción... ¡Oh, la traducción! ¿Qué es, si no una cruel y cruda crítica a lo más pejiguero de la lengua, presentada de una manera más sutil y más bella que un pamporcino en flor?
¡Qué alborozo! ¡Qué maravilla! ¡Qué nelumbo! ¡Qué escopladura! ¡Canastos! Tan solo un mal pazguato se atrevería a insultar el juego de los juegos, la excelencia de las excelencias, el modelo a seguir, el prototipo del futuro.

review: Одна из самых ужасных игр, в которые я когда-либо играл. Управление неудобное, геймплей в целом непродуманный и неинтересный, сюжета вообще нет, музыка раздражает через 37 секунд, смотрится просто ужасно некрасиво. В эту игру можно играть только при двух условиях: вы огромный фанат платформеров, и при этом игра досталась вам бесплатно.

author: {'steamid': '76561198055054505', 'num_games_owned': 593, 'num_reviews': 85, 'playtime_forever': 886, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 856, 'last_played': 1413734743}
review: Думал что это будет обычный платформер - оказалась игра в стиле - вот уровень, надо в замкнутом пространстве собрать все монетки. На вид - всё просто и казуально. Но чем дальше, тем сложнее. Уже на ~30 лвл к каждому уровню надо много подходов - сначала осмотреть карту и запомнить что и где, по какому направлению лучше идти, затем надо просто пройти уровень, после чего - сделать идеально, иначе очков для следующего этапа может не хватить. Игра бросает вызов и затягивает. И всё-таки одолеть 50-й уровень (вроде последний) не смог - сколько раз не доходил до финиша, не хватает 4 монеток, а где их взять непонятно. В итоге, игра отняла аж 15 часов жизни!

review:
Idk what I was expecting really. First off I got this game for free so yeah.
This game is just, no. I really can't see how anyone above the age of 10+ would enjoy this game. It should be free. I see these games all the time on sites like [b]coolmath.com[/b].


This game is a side-scrolling 2-D piece of *excuse my french* shit. The levels are repetive, the game is very predictable, I completed the second level in under a minute and somehow got 3 stars (the highest amount of stars you can get in one level). Don't waste your money or time on this game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198112873400', 'num_games_owned': 1923, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 1799, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1799, 'last_played': 1413563588}
review:
一款时限内收集物品的马里奥式小游戏，画风如商店截图，背景音乐单调。
那些给好评的不过是玩了两关就删游戏的+1党，什么难度不高，轻松无脑，全是盲人撸管，瞎JB扯淡，根本没切身体会到游戏的缺点。
到游戏后半出现秒杀机关，可以说除非游玩百遍，要不然死亡次数比肩黑魂，其致命缺点就在这，死亡后重生点位置飘忽，时远时近，有时在半空中，有时和怪重叠在一起，有时被秒杀机关刮到，又没有重生保护，连续被杀死两次三次是家常便饭，最可气的是在最终关后半，如果被一处机关杀死，其重生点竟然就在该机关正中间，于是死了活活了死，几秒后时限到，大侠请重新来过，你能想象做足前戏却射在内裤里的愤怒吗？这就是了。

author: {'steamid': '76561198025119176', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 116, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1413517198}
review: My kids liked this a lot more than I do, easy platformer that can be enjoyed by young children.  I got bored quickly with it, but it is what it is.  Good for the kiddos.

author: {'steamid': '76561198099123709', 'num_games_owned': 349, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1413520278}
review: Buen Juego :)

author: {'steamid': '76561198070811093', 'num_games_owned': 1388, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 115, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 102, 'last_played': 1413710224}
review: 有见过只能左、右、前空翻的游戏么，没有错，就是这个！游戏貌似只有13关（我还没通关ORZ···），每关都有等级，最多三星，游戏就是踩怪兽，吃金币，开宝箱，收集宝石的过程，最下面有时间限制，宝箱不一定要全开，但是金币和宝石是有一定要求的，玩着这个游戏起初觉得自己在找童年，后来才发现在丢智商······想做出超级玛丽的感脚，但是那个前空翻踩小怪兽的技能实在是难以掌握，我已经记不得库存里这游戏是怎么来的了，因为Playfire才下载下来玩的，反正不推荐~

author: {'steamid': '76561198009410722', 'num_games_owned': 216, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1275, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1275, 'last_played': 1411503413}
review:
На первый взгляд эта игра выглядит по детски простой, но не тут то было!!!
Только те, у кого хватит терпения, смогут пройти все испытания и найти древний артефакт, ибо всюду кишат лягухи, зелёные мыши (да-да!!!), стервятники, плещется лава, катятся камни, падают ловушки, летают топоры на верёвках. Всё это предстоит преодолеть, чтобы собрать разбросанные по уровню предметы и убежать на следующий этап. Слава Богу, что жизни тут бесконечные, не то я бы просто не выдержал!!! Смерть поджидает буквально на каждом шагу!!!
По мере прохождения, открываются новые персонажи, у каждого из них есть своя особая способность!
У меня от этой игры не совсем приятные ощущения. Если вы решитесь сыграть в эту игрушку, заранее хочу предупредить, держите себя в руках, не торопитесь и тогда всё у вас получится)

author: {'steamid': '76561197981005856', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 33, 'playtime_forever': 756, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 746, 'last_played': 1415124085}
review:
[h1]CANYON CAPERS[/h1]

A retro platform game that doesn't address any of the problems of the previous games.

Rating 1/10

I could quite easily enter into a long rant about what's wrong with Canyon Capers however I think it's easier to say that the Amiga gave us some great platform games like Harlequin, First Samurai, Fire & Ice, James Pond and Parasol Stars. 

'Huckleberry Hound In Hollywood Capers' was not one of them.

For everyone who had the misfortune to play that game 20 years ago you'll know what to expect from Canyon Capers.

author: {'steamid': '76561198047794531', 'num_games_owned': 1770, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 131, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 131, 'last_played': 1413229897}
review:
Questo platform è così brutto che non merita nemmeno una recensione dettagliata; stilerò semplicemente una lista pro/contro.

[b]Contro:[/b]

- Neanche un vago accenno di storia: fondamentalmente il gioco si riduce ad un "[i]trova le gemme colorate[/i]"
- I comandi non rispondono adeguatamente
- Livelli fotocopia e noiosi
- Traduzione a dir poco scandalosa!!!! "[i]Per la telefonia mobile verso l'alto le molle sono utili[/i]"
- Il sonoro è composto da una vasta gamma di pernacchie e versetti puerili malamente registrati

[b] Pro[/b]

- Non pervenuti

[h1]Un vero insulto verso l'intelligenza di ogni gamer.[/h1]

author: {'steamid': '76561197999935168', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1189, 'playtime_forever': 132, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1513551912}
review:
There once was a used condom at the bottom of a new york chinese restaurant back alley dumpster and it had a name, Canyon Capers. There are no canyons to be found, there are no capers to be found, and there is no fun to be found no matter how long and hard you search. This would have been better off had the name been used for a porno and the game not even made. Or at least been named "Pure Garbage".
Without doubting myself for even a hundredth of a second I can say this game has the worst, most generic music in the history of video games. It sounds like what the soundtrack for farming simulator would be if it had one (it might I have no idea). The sound is also beyond horrible, possibly the worst sound effects ever for a game. When you get hit it sounds like a guy opening his mouth and shaking his head going "rba-rba-rba" and when you jump on an enemy it makes a fart sound effect. The game is highly generic. The graphics are a poorly failed attempt at being retro. The art direction is as standard as it gets: snakes, frogs, rats, gems, green backgrounds, fire pits, dirty diapers, all animated the equivalent of paper cutouts. Through the twenty minutes I was playing, I was constantly taking damage through a combination of the controls being slippery and poor hit detection on the hit boxes around enemies, combined with the fact that I just did not care even the slightest bit if I was being hit or not because I knew right away that after my short while in the game it was going to be uninstalled and forgotten forever.

I think this seriously might just be a parody game and not supposed to be played as a real game. Even if that is true, it is still a poor, unfunny attempt at mocking video games.

This was free and I still feel like I overpayed.
1/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198011012737', 'num_games_owned': 1458, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 331, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 324, 'last_played': 1437906794}
review:
If you're picking this game up for free? Fine, at least you didn't have to pay a dime to add another game to your collection. But don't pay any amount of money on this title. Get the trading cards, and be on your way, because there is little enjoyment to be found in the slippery controls, JUST out of reach platforms that you have to time exact jumps to get on to, and tedious and time consuming back tracking to collect that one item that unlocks the exit portal. Speaking of which, good luck figuring out which item opens the portal, because it changes with each level, but the items from previous levels remain.

It's about as fun as it sounds.

author: {'steamid': '76561197979844945', 'num_games_owned': 104, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1412782988}
review:
Das Spiel ist gut gemacht. Mehrere Welten mit mehreren Leveln, die im Schwierigkeitsgrad steigen. Allein die Steuerung (Pfeiltasten) kann da den Spielspaß mindern. Aber das ist mein persönlicher Kritikpunkt, der aufgrund jahrelanger Steuerung mit WASD entsteht. Ansonsten ein nettes Spiel für "zwischendurch".

Zum Gameplay:

In jedem Level geht es darum möglichst viele Edelsteine,Kisten o.ä. einzusammeln. Umso mehr und umso schneller, desto mehr Punkte. Das Punktelevel wird zum Schluß mit 1 bis 3 Sternen bewertet (ähnlich AngryBirds, Candy Crush usw). Erst ab einem bestimmten Sternelevel geht es zur nächsten Welt. Ich denke, dass genau das den Spielspaß ausmacht, weil es den Ehrgeiz weckt und man unbedingt weiterkommen will. Nicht schlecht gemacht.

Zur Verbesserung:

Gegner sollten nicht wieder direkt in einem spawnen. Ist sehr nervig und leicht deprimierend. Da schlägt man sich so gut durch ein Level und dann taucht ein Gegner auf den man schon kalt gemacht hat und spawnd direkt in dir -.-
Einstellungen zu Steuerung müssen her. Springen auf der Leertaste ist ja okay, aber der Rest bitte mit WASD. Ich komme darauf einfach nicht klar :D

Fazit:

Wer ne nette Beschäftigung für ein paar Minuten braucht, liegt mit dem Spiel genau richtig!

author: {'steamid': '76561198018802471', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 425, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 425, 'last_played': 1412691664}

author: {'steamid': '76561198025119092', 'num_games_owned': 2060, 'num_reviews': 64, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1412763934}
review:
コインを取る、宝石を取る、宝石箱を開ける、食べ物を食う
場合には爆弾を順番に拾う
時間内に集めてワープゾーンへ行く
そんなステージがずっと続く
それだけでもつまらないのだが
そこにイライラする要素が追い討ちをかける

敵は踏みつけて倒すのだが、時間が経つと復活するので倒す意味なし
敵に触れるとノックバックが起こり、小さな足場で喰らうと一番下まで落下してしまうことがよくある。けど落下死がないだけまだマシ?
ライフが存在する意味がわからない。ライフが無くなっても近くで復活する仕様。残機は無限
大岩、電流らしき何かに触れたり、溶岩に落ちるとライフの量関係なく死ぬ。が、復活する。残機は無限

極めつけはイラっくるプレイヤーキャラの顔だろうね
立ち止ってると手を振る動作がある。こっちみんな気色悪い
しかし何故ジャンプは常にバク宙なのか?。たぶんだけど薬でもヤってるに違いないかも

カード対応なので、ドロップし終わったら即アンインスコ推奨

author: {'steamid': '76561198107661628', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 7, 'playtime_forever': 136, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 82, 'last_played': 1456061048}
review:
Скучно, да и геймплей ничем не порадовал...
За пол часа игры заметил кучу недостатков:

1) Кривое управление ( Анимация прыжков сильно раздражает. Запрыгнув на балку, вниз опустится уже нельзя, приходится спускаться и проходить всю карту, чтобы залезть обратно)
2) Иногда герой просто не долетает до цели, а иногда он проскакивает через неё (и такое случается очень часто) 
3) Музыка неплохая, но однообразная и быстро надоедает...
4) Монстры, которые появляются прямо под твоими ногами и просто тебя убивают

В плюсы могу приписать только одно: Игра напоминает старые хардкорные платформеры, которые многим нравились

Вердикт таков      4 / 10

author: {'steamid': '76561198026454771', 'num_games_owned': 1216, 'num_reviews': 156, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1412782798}
review:
Questo gioco non è retrò, come riportato dalla descrizione, ma un videogioco di deprecabile qualità.
Tralasciando la fastidiosissima interfaccia stile phone game, le grafiche poco armoniche, gli effetti sonori registrati con banali voci umane (addirittura scoregge: tripudio di divertimento e professionalità *sarcasmo a palate*) ed un gameplay macchinoso, lento e poco reattivo (che mostra evidenti segni di uso di preset e non di sviluppo diretto del codice),  questo videogioco ha davvero poco da offrire: le trading cards di Steam.
Il mio parere è che può essere categorizzato come trash game, ma, a quanto pare, gli sviluppatori sono fermamente convinti della serietà del loro lavoro (che vendono a 6 euro).
Vorrei, anche, scusarmi con le infinità di trash game presenti su internet visto che, in alcuni casi, sono migliori di questo titolo pur essendo gratuiti.

Acquisto sconsigliato. Se cercate un piattaforma retrò, state lontani da questo titolo.

review: Не игра, а убожество. Если вам захотелось поиграть в хороший платформер, выбор их огромен, так что советую проходить мимо этого проекта. author: {'steamid': '76561198072210849', 'num_games_owned': 278, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 325, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 325, 'last_played': 1412534444}
review:
I don't like it :(
Wanted to try if for acheivements and maybe someday I will complete it. 
[EDIT 2 years later]
I will never complete it.

This is annoying game with old feeling to it. It even works like games loong time ago - flustrating thigs e.g. you cannot jump to above ledge because if you do that you get damage! ;( other times after you died you re-appear in the spot where a snake is or other thing that deals dmg to you instantly with no way to avoid it! I understand that someone took a lot of time to create it. Maybe it was to feel and work as an old game but it doesn't change the fact that:
- you have one music the whole time and it is terrible
- i didn't feel any difficulty change going futher on
- the worlds change almost notning, it looks pretty the same but small elements of the background are added.
I played "Prehistoic 2" back in the days and it was wonderful. Don't remeber stupid mechanics in there and lvls were more diverse graphically.
Too little effort I would say :(

review:
Canyon Capers is a pretty cheap platforming game. It has an horrible level design and projectiles. Imagine fireballs with a RANDOM TRAJECTORY coming from lava pools. On top of being annoying to play, it is simply boring. It feels like a chore to play and collect everything.

Overall, I strongly recommend against this game. It's not fun.

author: {'steamid': '76561198044695906', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 62, 'playtime_forever': 63, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1413942598}
review:
TL;DR;

I WILL RECOMMEND IT, BUT ON A HUGE DISCOUNT THOUGH.
I would be negative, but I liked the effort.
=============================================================================

Dear developers: Sorry for being so strict on you, but I am a retro platformer fan. 
I hope you will make something better if you make some money with this one.
I would be negative, but it seems you tried hard to make it. Just read what people say about it and make your next game better. Nobody makes the perfect game on the first try (I hope this is your first game, it seems like it).

==========================================================================
Canyon Capers...
I love retro platform games.
I grew up with Superfrog, Baby Jo in going Home, Ruff n Tumble, Turrican series, Rick Dangerous series, James Pond series, Doodle bug, Sonic the Hedgehog, Mario, Leander, and many more good stuff. Back then platformers were shining in 16 bit systems big time.

So what about now?
What is Canyon Capers?

It's a platform game that looks pretty  but has a lot of flaws in my opinion.
It is the kind of games that you can spare one Euro but not more than that.
I got it on a massive giveaway for free, so I am not angry about any of the flaws.
I can recommend it IF you really enjoy tricky platformers but first, we will talk about the flaws so you can have a good idea of what you have to expect:

1] The sprites are pretty but the movement is just some rotation instead of a good animation. They lost a good opportunity to make it shine. As it is, it seems unpolished.

2] The graphics of the second world seems that they don't fit together with the cartoon like sprites. What were they thinking? Good pseudo 3D graphics of an "Egyptian temple decoration" theme, merged with less sophisticated cartoonish sprites? Seriously? :P 
Second thing that makes it look indie and unpolished. But it still manage to look pretty.

3] 1 and 2 I can forgive them anytime if the gaming experience is good. But it's the kind of platformers that have knockback on hit. A jump will be interrupted and you will fall by colission monsters. And all that from the forst world that is a good tutorial through the levels.  It isn't even casual game since it has a timer. If you fail some times to jump right, or stealth your @ss, you will end up losing on time loss. Sometimes you don't have time to wait for moving platforms or stealth timing when you have a few failures. At least there is a good thing. Infinite lives. But a level starts with a spawning point on hazard of instant death so infinite lives saved the game really, because this seems like a design flaw!  

4] Music is nice. I can give them that. Not the best music ever, not the most variety there, I would prefer music according to the level theme. But it has the job done.

5] It has no inovvation really. It feels like a classic platformer. That's ok, but it could do better.

6] Finally, Steam achievements make it fun to play. Well placed ones. But still the game is far from perfect.

Bottomline, I recommend it, but only on a huge discount.

author: {'steamid': '76561198120029240', 'num_games_owned': 1246, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 220, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 213, 'last_played': 1650751595}
review:
เป็นเกมผจญภัยง่อยๆ ที่เล่นตอนแรกรู้สึกสนุกมากๆ
แต่ผ่านไปด่านหลังๆ รู้สึกจะเริ่มเป็นความเครียดมากกว่า 
กับระบบการควบคุมตัวละครที่ค่อนข้างระยำ อุปสรรคในด่านบางอย่างที่ทำให้เราพลาดบางจุดไปแล้วต้องไปเริ่มใหม่ใกลชิบหาย
ซึ่งแน่นอนว่ามันไม่ทันเวลา ทำให้ต้องเริ่มเล่นใหม่ซ้ำแล้วซ้ำเล่า 
ยังดีที่บางด่านมีหอยทากซ่อนอยู่ทำให้เราเก็บสามดาวได้ค่อนข้างจะแน่นอน
เงื่อนไขด่านบางด่านนี่เล่นแล้วรู้สึกว่าอยากจะบอกคนสร้างว่าให้เก็บไว้ให้พ่อคุณเล่นนะครับ 
คือด่านจะยากยังไงไม่ว่าแต่อยากให้การบังคับตัวละคร
มันง่ายกว่านี้หน่อยนึง อีกอย่างเสียง บรู่ๆๆๆ เวลาตัวเอกแม่งโดนอะไรชนมันฟังแล้วเพิ่มความน่าหงุดหงิดอย่างมาก

แนะนำให้ปิดเสียงจะเพิ่มสมาธิในการเล่นมากขึ้น

author: {'steamid': '76561198120898742', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 50, 'last_played': 1412456350}
review:
Nie wiem co za $^%$% to wymyślił ale ta gra to obelga dla całego gatunku platformówek. Kiepskie sterowanie, Niewybaczalne błędy dla tego gatunku (jeżeli przeciwnik nasz dotknął i mamy chwilową nieśmiertelność to NIE MOŻEMY NIC ZROBIĆ PRZECIWNIKOM dopóki nie zniknie nam ta nieśmiertelność), Niestabilna (Często gra wywala do pulpitu, tak ot bez powodu), Długie czasy ładowania nawet podczas zwykłego resetu planszy (sprawdzone na dysku ssd) , przeciętne plansze, nijaka muzyka, grafikę mogła mieć inny styl.
Zdobyłem to za darmo, dobrze że dropi karty to mam jakiś zwrot pieniędzy. Są lepsze gry za 6 ojro (lub nawet mniej lub wcale, np "You Have To Win This Game").

Nie i #$%@%. Serio.

author: {'steamid': '76561198095245395', 'num_games_owned': 844, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 130, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 130, 'last_played': 1412368322}
review:
This is an awful 2d platform game.

While usually I would detail why a game is bad so as not to upset the developer without reason, I belive there are more then enough review explaining that already. Just to summarize: bad graphics, bad level design, uninspiring gameplay, awful controls and much more.

For those wandring, the game was free via IndieGala. I wasn't impressed - to say the least - so avoided it even still. If it wasn't for GMG and their credit rewards which compelled me to try it (it's free and I get money? sure, i'll try it) there would have been one less negative review here.

Last time I checked Retro didn't mean bad.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058342664', 'num_games_owned': 753, 'num_reviews': 83, 'playtime_forever': 321, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 209, 'last_played': 1412761936}
review:
この世の歪みたいなイラストのキャラクターが主人公のジャンプアクションだ！
グラフィックはカートゥーンっぽいのに環境光やらエフェクトやらが妙にリッチで違和感がすごいぞ！
主人公は何故か常に小さい歩幅で小走り！足音が異様！ついでにジャンプは常にバク宙！
ステージごとに特に説明もなくルールが変わって面食らったりするぞ！
大石が転がるステージとかではリスポーン即死亡もザラ！踏みつけ攻撃も斜め上辺りにいる敵が死んだり当たり判定がなんか酷い！
1時間は苦笑しながら酷さを楽しめると思うよ！

author: {'steamid': '76561198013271357', 'num_games_owned': 623, 'num_reviews': 20, 'playtime_forever': 173, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 35, 'last_played': 1413638470}
review: Gra nie daje satysfakcji z rozgrywki jest męcząca powtarzalna. Sterowanie jest nie do końca fair wobec gracza (niedopracowane). Ciężko wytrzymać z nią dłuższą chwilę. Moim zdaniem nie warta więcej ni 1-1,5 Eur jednakże kosztuje aż 6 Eur. Gdy bym nie otrzymał gry zadarmo nie moglibyście przeczytać tej recenzji. Jednak jeśli macie grę za free można poświęcić jej kilkadziesiąt minut aby otrzymać karty i co bardzo lubię pozdobywać kilka aczików :D. Podsumowując gra nie zrobiła na mnie wrażenia podobne tytułu można spotkać na stronach z grami FLASHowymi. Więc moja ocena będzie negatywna. Pozdrawiam ~KamilBerys

author: {'steamid': '76561198034663705', 'num_games_owned': 8151, 'num_reviews': 112, 'playtime_forever': 153, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 153, 'last_played': 1412320712}
review: Canyon Capers is an item-collection platformer with timed stages that casts you as brain-damaged Cabbage Patch kids who have yet to learn the coordination and balance required to walk, much less platform.  Your job is to teach them to not weeble, wobble and fall the fuck down while suffering knockback from everything in the game. Good luck with that.

author: {'steamid': '76561197960775026', 'num_games_owned': 1931, 'num_reviews': 163, 'playtime_forever': 268, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 177, 'last_played': 1465128120}
review:
Jeu de plateforme qui se révèle très sympa (alors que je l'ai eu gratuit grâce à Indiegala).
Même si les graphismes ne payent pas de mine au premier abord, on se rend vite compte que niveau jouabilité et défis ça se révèle très intéressant.
La maniabilité est un peu déconcertante au départ:
Il se trouve que après s'être fait toucher par un ennemi on clignote (on est donc invulnérable) mais pendant ce temps, à l'inverse des autres jeux du genre on peut pas tuer les ennemis... C'est un peu déconcertant mais on s'y fait! (et ça relève un peu le challenge il est vrai...)
Cependant je lui trouve un défaut: lorsqu'on attérit sur plusieurs ennemis à la fois, on se fait toucher alors qu'on est censé tous les écraser!... C'est dommage mais ça ne baisse pas l'intérêt global de l'expérience.
Bref, un jeu à la hauteur du genre et c'est pas courant car je trouve bon nombre de jeux de plateforme assez médiocres pour la plupart!

author: {'steamid': '76561198148547755', 'num_games_owned': 83, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 141, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 65, 'last_played': 1452993697}

author: {'steamid': '76561198016780279', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 55, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 46, 'last_played': 1412543834}
review: This game is a steaming pile of crap! I got it for free, and it was still not worth it. It's ugly, annoying, unresponsive, and almost every death feels really cheap.  Your character moves sluggishly through the most uninspired levels I've ever seen. Stones materializes out of thin air right above you and insta-kills you. This is the kind of video game that makes people violent, and for all the wrong reason. It's just soooo frustatingly crappy! I have played more retro platformers than I can count, but this is the worst I've ever played. I am serious. THE WORST!

author: {'steamid': '76561198011099088', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 183, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 183, 'last_played': 1412307757}
review: Absolutely disgusting

author: {'steamid': '76561197998538987', 'num_games_owned': 1074, 'num_reviews': 231, 'playtime_forever': 193, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 193, 'last_played': 1412362238}
review: Hűha... Nos a Canyon Capers elvileg az eredeti, 1992-es játék újragondolása lenne, de mivel én ezelőtt nem hallottam sem az eredetiről, sem erről, így nem fogom hasonlítgatni a kettőt egymáshoz. Próbáltam szeretni ezt a játékot, de a felhasználói vélemények nagy részéhez hasonlóan én sem tudtam megbarátkozni vele. Platformerhez képest ez a játék nagyon gyenge. itt nem a vizuális megvalósításra célzok, mert az olyan, amilyen. Manapság amúgy is a retrografika lett ismét a divat, de ettől függetlenül ez a játék egy szemét. Nem haragszom rá, mert ingyen osztogatták, no de ez 6 euró? Ugyan már, ne nevettessük egymást!!! A hangok gagyik és idegesítőek, a karakter mozgása nincs normálisan optimizálva, ide-oda csúszkál, nehéz belőni vele egy pontos ugrást, ami legtöbb esetben ahhoz vezet, hogy nekiugrunk az ellenfeleknek. no meg ez is, hogy az ellenfelek respawnolnak, mekkora hülye ötlet. Ettől nem nehéz, hanem idegesítő lesz csak a játék. Ha ezt komolyan kihívásként akarták felhasználni, akkor a fejlesztők nagyon-nagyon rossz úton haladnak. Okosan is meg lehet ezt oldani (Lásd Jazz Jackrabbit 2) Egyetlen előnye csak az, hogy dob kártyákat és ingyen volt. na meg lehet vele Playfire rewardokat szerezni. Aki meg platformer, ugrálós játékokat keres, az keresgéljen máshol, mert ez a játék harmatgyenge és csak felhúzza az ember agyát (főleg, ha pénzt adott ki ezért a szemétért). Vagy csak lehet én ittam túl sok kávét :|

author: {'steamid': '76561198067058734', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1410213101}
review:
Got it for free, and I am really glad that i didn't pay money for it, to be honest.
The game just doesn't feel a proper modern game: the gameplay feels boring, repetitive, uninspired.
And trust me I love indie games (Terraria, Minecraft, The Cat Lady, To the Moon, etc. etc.), probably even more than AAA games.
Face the truth, even for a 2D platformers, there are way better games out of here on the market: buy them instead

author: {'steamid': '76561198008822630', 'num_games_owned': 1472, 'num_reviews': 23, 'playtime_forever': 216, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1456118613}

author: {'steamid': '76561198069533770', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 152, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14, 'last_played': 1418717023}
review:
Es un juego bastante extraño en realidad, la movilidad es, digamos, "demasiado" suavizada, lo que en algún momento dificulta un poco el hecho de moverse por el entorno. Bastante simple la interfaz, la mecánica y la música, por lo que puedo deducir que se trata de un juego hecho por un equipo de desarrollo (o una persona) que está dando sus primeros pasos en el ámbito del desarrollo de videojuegos, así que no me disgusta la simplicidad del mismo. Aunque algo que me disgustó un poco es la traducción al español, al parecer hecha con Bing. Resulta mucho más agradable jugarlo en inglés x_x

El juego en sí es de plataformas, y se basa en avanzar por el escenario recolectando las gemas que están distribuidas en él, al igual que algunas monedas. Está bueno como para pasar el rato, superar un nivel, dejarlo ahí, y luego volver a jugarlo un tiempo después. Lo recomiendo, porque aunque sea un poco "cutre" como dicen por ahí, es entretenido y te hace pasar el rato.

author: {'steamid': '76561197999811476', 'num_games_owned': 1846, 'num_reviews': 52, 'playtime_forever': 120, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1414763163}
review:
宝石やコインなどの目的のアイテムを集めるゲーム
ステージごとに最大で☆を3つ獲得することができ、一定数集めることで次の面に行くことができる

モバイル向けに作られていたとしか思えないUI
ステージセレクトはカーソルキーで選択しようとすると動くたびにウェイトが入り時間がかかる
だが、マウスでも選択できるため問題はない
敵は踏みつけることで倒せるが、一体ずつしか倒せないため2体以上重なっている場合必ずダメージを受ける
敵の攻撃判定が少し前にまで存在するため当たっていないのにダメージを受ける
ダメージを食らうとノックバックし、一定時間無敵になるが無敵時間中は敵を倒すことができない
また無敵時間中でもトラップは効くためノックバックして即死することがよくある
敵は出現エフェクトが出た瞬間からダメージ判定がある
リフトの動く速度が遅く、時間制限のあるステージではリフトがこなくてリトライがよくある
ステージの初めからリトライは5秒ほどのローディングが入る
☆3を獲得するにはスコアを稼がないとならないが、目標を先に集めてしまうと残りのスコア用アイテムが全て消える
特定のキャラ以外残りの目標アイテムの場所が表示されないため、見逃すとステージの端から端まで見直す必要が出てくる
それなのに集める目標の数が多い上、穴など見えない場所にも配置されている

700円でゴミを買いたい人にはオススメ

author: {'steamid': '76561198141000735', 'num_games_owned': 205, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 79, 'last_played': 1434474798}
review:
Que es esto? esto no es un juego de plataforma, tiene sonidos que probablemente te terminen dando una paralisis encefalica y tambien un pequeño temblequeo en el parpado izquierdo.
Se nota que el creador toma como referencia y pone en practica antiguos planteos filosoficos tales como "El que pilla pilla o si no se agarra la morcilla" planteado por Davinci en la epoca Renacentista. Tambien podemos decir que hace mucho incapie en que una persona con sobrepeso y ropajes afeminados, puede tener una gran aventura y enfrentarse a grandes desafios. Desde luego que las desiciones que tome nuestro personaje nos haran pensar y proyectar nuestra vida y asi cuestionarnos si lo que hacemos es lo correcto.

En conclusion este es un juego que vale la pena jugarlo, siempre y cuando estemos dispuestos a sumergirnos en un sin fin de emociones que pueden ir, desde lo encantador hasta la propia deposicion en tus pantalones.

"No se si usted sabia que la banana no tiene carozo, tiene un filamento grueso que dificulta la masticación, por lo tanto la banana no se come se shupa." - Dino (Antes de la pelea contra el boss final nos deja este pequeño mensaje tan emotivo).

author: {'steamid': '76561198022997080', 'num_games_owned': 2142, 'num_reviews': 388, 'playtime_forever': 140, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 140, 'last_played': 1411765280}
review:
I have no clever way to start off this review. No witty wordplay or abstract analogy to somehow tie back in with the game I'm discussing, no recount of the developers history, and no commentary on how it fits in with the evolution of video games as a medium. That's because Canyon Capers allows absolutely no creative thought to entire or leave your head while you slog your way through it's glaring mediocrity, as silent pleas for it to end fill every crevice of your mind.

That likely sounds a little harsh, but Canyon Capers really doesn't give you much to work with in attempts to find fun in its hollow core. It's a floaty platformer collectathon, which unsuccessfully attempts to instill variety by swapping out the object you're hunting as you spin jump your way through nondescript, annoying designed levels as a bastardized Cabbage Patch Kid. Controlling it is a chore, and levels are designed in such a way as to require you to go through long periods of backtracking with every minor mistake you make. It's monotonous, tedious, and so painfully amateur in every single aspect of its design that it would almost look out of place at a 24 hour game jam.

I could likely go into greater detail on each and every aspect of one of Canyon Capers laundry list of flaws, but the thought of spending more time writing about it is almost as unappealing as playing it again, so I'm going to cut my short and assume I've spewed enough vitriol to get my point across. I couldn't recommend spending your time with this game if it was free in a browser, and I really can't see anyone coming away satisfied having actually paid money for it.

review:
Semplicemente uno dei giochi più spastici e brutti mai pubblicati,qui signori ci troviamo davanti all'apoteosi del trash,un gioco che probabilmente è stato fatto in flash da uno studente di informatica durante il cambio dell'ora.
Il gioco non è settabile in nessun modo,non si può variare la "grafica" e neppure l'audio si può modificare,solo se attivo o disattivo,mi stupisco ancora come sia stato accettato tra la libreria di Steam e che de addirittura abbia Achievement e carte di steam,perfino la traduzione in italiano è pessima con errori ortografici.

author: {'steamid': '76561197991369092', 'num_games_owned': 2901, 'num_reviews': 94, 'playtime_forever': 177, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 108, 'last_played': 1411894359}
review:
A bare-as-bones platformer.  Bad graphics, bad platforming, zero depth, and a lack of any real originality makes me honestly wonder how the heck this even made it onto steam.  The only honest-to-God reason for playing this I can imagine is solely the card-drop factor.  
Also, this is the first game I've ever played where invincibility frames actually work to the detriment of the player.  Stay FAR away, only buying this if forced to choose between this and Bad Rats.

review:
Recomendar este juego? A lo mucho por los cromos. Para suerte mia me toco un reflectante de un diamante rojo. Bueno al menos no me quejo. En si es muy no se. Se nota monotono el saltar y buscar todas las joyas.

author: {'steamid': '76561198017737010', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 109, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 95, 'last_played': 1412300994}
review:
Canyon Capers é um jogo simples com objetivo simples: Divertir você! 
Não se deixe enganar pelos gráficos. Recomendo Canyon Capers para todas as idades, pois o jogo cumpre o que promete, faz você perder a noção do tempo se entrertendo na frente do computador, sem contar que é engraçado e empolgante. 
O único ponto negativo é a jogabilidade feita nas setas, desprezando o sistema AWSD, mas isso não tira a diversão garantida do jogo.
Podem comprar, vale muito apena jogar Canyon Capers!

author: {'steamid': '76561198141575555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 129, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 30, 'last_played': 1419138474}
review:
เป็นเกมที่ให้เราเก็บเพชรหรือสมบัติให้ได้ครบตามที่กำหนดในแต่ละฉาก แล้วก็แก้ปริศนาในฉากนั้นๆไปด้วย ส่วนแถบสีเขียวก็คือเวลา มันจะลดลงไปเรื่อยๆ ถ้าเราเก็บของไม่ครบก็จะ failed หรือเล่นไม่ผ่านฉากนั่นเอง ต้องเสียเวลามาเล่นใหม่

แต่ใช้คีย์บอร์ดเล่นยากมาก  บางทีมันก็กระโดดไม่ถึง บางทีมันก็กระโดดข้ามไปซะงั้น ต้องกะจังหวะดีๆ หรือคีย์บอร์ดเรามันกดยากก็ไม่รู้
ยังไม่ได้ลองว่าใช้จอยเล่นได้หรือเปล่า ถ้าได็ก็คงจะเล่นง่ายขึ้นกว่านี้เยอะเลย  

โดยรวมๆก็สนุกดี เอาไว้เล่นฆ่าเวลาได้ เอาไปซัก 7/10 ก็พอแล้ว

author: {'steamid': '76561198032934450', 'num_games_owned': 690, 'num_reviews': 48, 'playtime_forever': 151, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 151, 'last_played': 1411575281}
review:
Als erstes muss ich sagen: ich hätte das Spiel sicher nicht gekauft, habe es aber kostenlos bekommen.
Die ersten paar Minuten ist es noch ganz witzig, aber dann wird es schon langweilig... es ist immer das gleiche:

laufe und sammel alles ein

Wer das mag, dem könnte das Spiel sogar eine zeitlang Spaß machen, allen anderen rate ich davon ab.

Ausserdem muss man eine gewisse Frustresistenz mitbringen, wenn man mit der Tastatur spielt (zum Gamepad kann ich nichts sagen), da die Steuerung manchmal einfach aussetzt (bzw. ein Kommando nicht erkennt), bei mir ist da ganze nicht reproduzierbar sondern tritt zufällig auf.

Immerhin gibt es ein paar Tradingcards.

author: {'steamid': '76561198056495080', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 123, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 112, 'last_played': 1412816716}
review:
My Grandmother smoked her whole life. I was about 7 years old when my mother said to her, "If you ever want to see your grandchildren graduate, you have to stop immediately." Tears welled up in her eyes when she realized what exactly was at stake. She gave it up immediately.
Three years later she died of lung cancer. It was really sad and destroyed me. My mother said to me: "Don't ever smoke. Please don't put your family through what your Grandmother put us through." I agreed. I'm now 20 and I have never touched a cigarette.

I must say, I feel a slight sense of regret for never having done it, because this game gave me cancer anyways.

author: {'steamid': '76561198059095828', 'num_games_owned': 3334, 'num_reviews': 337, 'playtime_forever': 680, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 127, 'last_played': 1411598543}

author: {'steamid': '76561198030859897', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 237, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 237, 'last_played': 1411512925}
review:
It's an OK Platformer; solid but not actually good. I wouldn't recommend it,
You can go left/ right and jump, That's it, that's all there is to it; no running, double jump, wall jump or anything else.
If you're a platformer junky please go ahead. As you progress you unlock more characters with unique abilities (locate exit, locate gems, absorb treasure,...), but the gameplay itself doesn't change. Considering the lmitations the controls offer the level design is acceptable.

author: {'steamid': '76561198040938152', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 113, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 113, 'last_played': 1411512291}
review:
It didn't take long for me to realize just why this game is being given away for free at Indie Gala.

It's fun for the first ten minutes and then just hovers on the same level of repetitiveness. All you're doing in all the levels, is collecting gems, treasure chests and coins before the timer runs out. And the sound effects often reminded me of the slot machines in Vegas, especially in the level menu (which is far from a good thing).

A very shallow, annoying and boring platformer. Don't spend your money on this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198086594039', 'num_games_owned': 2870, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 13, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1422934605}
review: Run and jump, collect gems and chests, pretty straight forward platformer.  Played through a few levels and nothing stood out as outstanding but likewise there was nothing that stood out as flawed either.  The controls were easy and responded the way I would have wanted them to.  It seems like the kind of game you put on your phone or computer for young children to play.

author: {'steamid': '76561198115680619', 'num_games_owned': 663, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 245, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 175, 'last_played': 1435562800}
review:
Für Zwischendurch ist es bestimmt eine super aber für mehr auch nicht das Spielprinzip ist sehr simpel man hüpft durch die Level wie damals bei Super Mario nur das Mario mehr konnte außer Links und Rechts sowie Springen denn mehr kann man in diesem Spiel nicht tuen.
Es geht im grunde dadrum im Level alles einzusammeln was dort so rumliegt und so den Ausgang in form eines Wirbels erscheinen zu lassen während des Spieles schaltet man weitere Karaktere frei die alle irgrgendwas besonderes können sollen.
Selbst für ein Spiel was von Amateuren Programmiert wurde muß man sagen ist dieses nun nicht gerade eins der besten Kurzweiulig aber mehr auch nicht.
Es fehlt vieleswas man dem Nutzer normal schon geben solte was mir am meisten aufgestoßen ist, ist die fehlende Tastatur neubelegung die aber im grunde auch hier völlig daneben währe gesteuert wird mit den Pfeiltasten Links und Rechts, Springen geht mit der Leertaste mehr gibt es so wie ich das Spiel verstehe auch nicht.
Lauffähig ist es auf jeder Möhre da keine Grafischen Ansprüche gestellt werden.
Habe es als Giveaway bekommen von daher finde ich es völlig Ok aber Geld würde ich dafür nie bezahlen wollen denn mehr wie ein par Cent währe schlicht Straßenraub da einem so nichts geboten wird was mehr rechtfertigt.
Was zu einem Wiederspielwert führt sind die Steam Errungenschaften und die Steam Trading Cards aber mehr auch nicht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198010153844', 'num_games_owned': 848, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 114, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1412351354}

author: {'steamid': '76561197990179701', 'num_games_owned': 1206, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 202, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 202, 'last_played': 1411495095}
review:
Guidate un bambino ciccione che esplorerà caverne piene di mostri senza un apparente motivo in modo da rubare più gemme/tesori/FETTE DI ANGURIA che può. Una volta raccolti  gli oggetti richiesti (oro, tesori, gemme, cibo...o tutti e 4) sbloccherete un portale magico che non si sa come vi poterà al livello successivo. 

Consigliato solo agli amanti del genere, per me è no.

Pro:
+ Il bimbo ciccione è tenerello

Contro:
- Ripetitivo (possono cambiare gli oggetti richiesti, ma non per questo cambia qualcosa)
- Impossibilità di sparare ai nemici, siamo obbligato ad ucciderli saltandoci sopra e schiacciandoli col nostro enorme peso
- Nemici volanti impossibili da uccidere e spesso difficili da schivare

Voto: 5/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198028937831', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 175, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 119, 'last_played': 1412370039}
review:
Si te gustan los juegos de plataformas cutres onda minijuegos.com, ESTE ES TU JUEGO!
Basicamente tienes qe hacer los pequeños niveles recolectando todas las gemas o cofres o monedas que haya. Cosa que se hace sola, pero tienes que sacar 3/3 calificacion para hacerlo bien. BASICO, si quieres matar el tiempo dale.
Pero fuera de eso, no compite con la gama de calidad de juegos indie que hay en el mercado
GRAFICOS: CUTRES
MUSICA: CUTRE
SOUNDFX: SACADOS DE OTRO LADO
INTERFASE: SUPERCUTRE

Aunque si le pongo este juego en la compu a mi sobrinito, capas lo juega chocho.. a menos que ya haya cumplido los 10.
CALIFICACION: BAJONIVEL (CUTRE)

author: {'steamid': '76561198054891702', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 133, 'playtime_forever': 424, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 424, 'last_played': 1411379215}
review:
Никудышная игра, ужасный платформер и бессмысленная трата денег.

Что бросилось в глаза с самого начала:

1) Ну ооочень мало настроек.

Казалось бы, особо и не проблема. А нет, зайдя в игру понимаешь, что от отвратительного дизайна и непонятно выбранной яркости экрана (которая ещё и отличается в разных его частях) начинают болеть глаза. Как это исправить? А никак, игра такого выбора не дает. 

2) Ужасная и надоедливая музыка, которая постоянно повторяется.

Та же проблема продолжается и в игре. Звуки одни и те же, они приедаются и бесят.

3) (Проблема для меня). Я зашёл "выбить" из этой игры карточки и решил хоть немного на неё посмотреть -> За запуск уровня мне дали ачивмент, который испортил статистику моих общих достижений в Steam, что заставляет меня сейчас в неё играть.

Что понимаешь потом:

1)  У врагов отсутствует понятие "хитбокс". 

Я всегда говорил сам себе, "Если хочешь что-то добавить в игру, сначала сделай так, чтобы оно работало нормально". 
Мне так нравится, когда ты прыгаешь прямо на противника и получаешь урон, что словами этого просто не передать.

2) Прыжки в этой игре - непонятная хрень. 

Тоже, вроде как, не проблема. Но стоит вспомнить, что 80% этой игры - это и есть прыжки. Тут я не могу ничего объяснить, в эту игру просто нужно поиграть, чтобы понять, насколько там с этим всё плохо.

В общем и вкратце, я ненавижу эту игру.

review:
Precio alto para lo que ofrece. Mala traducción al español (hecha con el traductor de Google y ni siquiera revisada), jugabilidad pésima. Música y desafíos repetitivos. De Retro no tiene ni los gráficos. Parece el típico juego que se hace en un par de horas para un trabajo de informática de última hora.

No se lo recomiendo ni a Rajoy.

author: {'steamid': '76561198073013681', 'num_games_owned': 471, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 38, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 38, 'last_played': 1411280496}
review:
数画面分のフィールドの中で、コインや宝石などをすべて集めて出てきた渦（？）に入ればクリア。
敵や障害物の配置が詰め込みすぎで、かつ、キャラクターの操作性がさほどよくないため、同じところでミスをしてしまいすっきりしない。
開発者の行き当たりばったり感が見え隠れしていて、「ほら面白いだろう？絵もこんなに可愛くて」と、問いかけてくる自己満足ゲーム。

Indie Galaで無料で頂いても2０分が限界でした。
おすすめしません。

author: {'steamid': '76561198119047926', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 66, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 63, 'last_played': 1412444250}
review:
Fun simple 2d platform game.
You collect a certain amount of coins / gems / or diffuse a set amount of bombs in a particular order before a timer runs out.
The graphics are colorful and the controls are spacebar to jump and to move your character arund, the arrow keys.

It's under 200 mb in size too, so for those of you with limited storage in your PC - rejoice :D
I reccomend this game as it is genuinely fun.
6/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198055311780', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 186, 'playtime_forever': 107, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 107, 'last_played': 1415547752}
review:
[i][b]This game sucks?[/b][/i]
Here's the deal.
[quote][url=https://store.steampowered.com/curator/8257320/]Be sure to leave a like, comment and join Grumpy Reviews[/url][/quote]
[quote][url=https://www.patreon.com/GrumpyReviews]Liked the review? Leave me a tip on Patreon[/url][/quote]
I see the obvious sprite rips and the sprite 'spinning' instead of an actual jump animation and other stuff that is just fabulously bad! I read the reviews and I expected a bomb of a game, simple shovelware. But I was surprised. Very surprised.

[i][b]Amiga 2600[/b][/i]
The game plays and feels like an old Amiga game. In the looks department, eh, Amiga has come a long way since then but Amiga owners are a very small crowd now and the golden era for Amiga has long since passed. Although still, their is something about that more innocent era of video games, similar to games done in the style of an NES, like Megaman 9 & 10 where it just takes you right back to your childhood where you would look past the bad and just buckle down to enjoy that weekend rented game.

Times have changed though, Amiga is virtually dead, gamers no longer 'rent' games and expectations are very high. 
If you are not the kind of person who cares for a retro throwback then you will not care for this game too much at all. As far as platform games go, it isn't bad but it isn't good either. Think of early Castlevania's, BEFORE symphony of the night, clustered with unfair deaths and it will give you a good sense of what you are getting into.

[i][b]What a canyon load of caper![/b][/i]
Infact as it turns out, the game does indeed have it roots in an Amiga game, of the name "Huckleberry Hound in Hollywood Capers". Amusingly enough the Amiga game was met with mixed to bad reviews which just goes to show that a good game, is forever good and a bad game is forever bad! I hated that game as a child, it was so...Bad! You wasted my weekends Kevin Blake (Lead Programmer), I will find you and I will dump a log on your face and I'm not talking about the wood kind!

[i][b]Are you for real?![/b][/i]
[i]Did you know?[/i]
Canyon Capers is a reskin of Huckleberry Hound in Hollywood Capers?

[i]Did you also know?[/i]
Huckleberry Hound in Hollywood Capers was a reskin of Dino Jnr. in Canyon Capers?!

Dammit Kevin, I haven't seen stuff pulled like this since the 'Ninjabread Man' = 'Anubus II' = '‎Myth Makers: Trixie in Toyland', Fiasco!

[spoiler]If you are an Amiga fan, then this game will take you right back to that era in no short order, which is why I recommended it. It is a faithful recreation of the amiga experience.[/spoiler]

Join Grumpy reviews for all your gaming needs
http://steamcommunity.com/groups/grumpyreviews

author: {'steamid': '76561198056857183', 'num_games_owned': 805, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 128, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1450724315}
review:
Nie grać! Serio - bierzcie karty i wychodźcie. Grałem w swoim życiu w sporo platformówek ale jeszcze nie natknąłem się na tak słaby produkt jakim jest Canyon Capers. Ta gra nawet nie stara się być dobra. Już samo menu sugeruje, że mamy przed sobą produkt tandetny co najmniej. Po włączeniu przycisku start, oczom naszym ukazuje się poziom sklecony na szybko, brzydki i nijaki. Uwierzcie - to nie jest celowy zabieg postarzania gry. Nigdy nie przykładałem specjalnej wagi do grafiki, szczególnie gdy ktoś ma pomysł na ambitną grę, która do mnie przemówi (Papers Please) lub zrelaksuje przez kilka godzin. Niestety jedyne co mogło mną wstrząsnąć w związku z tą grą to porażenie mózgowe. Ktoś wrzucił wszystkie elementy, które wydawały mu się "fajne" w platformówkach i wyszedł z tego taki o to "potworek". Mamy więc: całą masę wrogów, którzy ku naszej uciesze respawnują się niezwykle szybko, niezliczoną ilość monet/kryształów/bomb do rozbrojenia (jedyny tryb do przełknięcia) na poziom, którą trzeba zebrać aby przejść przez portal, który.. pojawia się w środku mapy.. Nie no genialne rozwiązanie. Szczególnie gdy zapomnisz zebrać jednej monety z 135 potrzebnych. Wszystko dopełniają naprawdę wkurzające sterowanie, które nigdzie, ale to nigdzie nie jest opisane i muzyka, którą radzę wyłączyć jak najszybciej, bo Twoje poczucie estetyki nigdy Ci nie wybaczy słuchania tego jazgotu dłużej niż minutę.

Dla leniwych, nie kupować! Całe szczęście, że była za darmo i ma karty kolekcjonerskie.
Nie chcę nawet wyliczać minusów - za długo by wymieniać
Ocena: zaszczytne 1+/10 (+ za karty)
Wysiadam

author: {'steamid': '76561198103268890', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 34, 'playtime_forever': 1154, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1154, 'last_played': 1411196185}
review:
Je ne suis absolument pas d'accord avec toutes ses critiques négatives, j'ai eu ce jeu gratuitement, il est un parfait exemple de jeu de plate-formes qu'on trouvait au début des années 1990 sur Atari, Amiga et consoles 8 bits et 16 bits.

Certes le jeu est super classique (déplacement + saut pour éliminer les monstres pour le perso principal et des persos à débloqués avec des pouvoirs par la suite) mais la maniabilité est parfaite, les graphismes mignon tout plein et le jeu suffisamment addictif pour rejouer chaque niveau et avoir les fameuses 3 étoiles (pour les succès) donc à 2 ou 3€ dans un pack indépendant ça reste un bon achat.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035808481', 'num_games_owned': 1651, 'num_reviews': 87, 'playtime_forever': 108, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 12, 'last_played': 1434169351}
review: Normalerweise verfasse ich kein Review ohne ein Spiel durchgespielt zu haben, aber in diesem Fall muss ich das Spiel nicht durchspielen um sagen zu können warum ich es NICHT empfehle. Zuerst einmal scheint der gesamte deutsche Text mit dem Bing Übersetzer aus dem Koreanischen übersetzt zu sein, sodass man teilweise bestenfalls erraten kann was sie zu sagen versuchen. Zusätzlich ist da der Sprung. Da das Spiel Jump and Run ist kann man nicht viel mehr als springen, da sollte man einen besseren Sprung erwarten, als den, den man hier bekommt. Dass man sich im sprung einmal um 360 Grad dreht ist zwar verwirrend, aber nicht dass Problem. Das Problem ist, dass man teilweise Sprünge perfekt schaffen um weiter zu kommen, die Steuerung ist jedoch gleichzeitig so mies, dass das sehr schwer wird. Dies ist wieder ein Beispiel für ein Spiel, dass schwer ist, ohne es sein zu wollen. Unschön ist auch, dass Gegner respawnen. Da man mit Leben nur so zugepumpt ein Level beginnt ist das vor allem eher störend als gefährlich. Teilweise sind Gegner auch an positionen in denen es fast unmöglich ist nicht getroffen zu werden. Der Respawn passiert fast ohne vorwarnung, kurze Zeit nach dem Tod des Gegners und wenn man pech hat direkt in einen hinein. Das aussehen des Spiels ist natürlich eine völlig subjective Sache, aber meiner Meinung nach habe ich dass in vielen Stilen schon besser gesehen. Insgesamt nicht zu empfehlen und schon gar nicht für den Preis. EDIT: Ich sehe grade, dass aus irgendeinem Grund 0 Stunden Spielzeit angezeigt wird, das stimmt aber nicht, denn ich habe das Spiel leider schon gespielt.

author: {'steamid': '76561198154650681', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 142, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 142, 'last_played': 1410729052}
review:
Not bad. Not great by any stretch of the imagination. But Canyon Capers is a reasonable product amongst a plethora of garbage here and elsewhere.

CC needs some more tweaking within the mechanics. The jumping and navigation feel extremely generic. This isn't cool as there are many free games with better control. Fix this issue and the price tag will be reasonable In its current state, it is nothing more than a game you buy whilst on sale. Decent time waster nonetheless.

I happen to think the graphics are decent and fit well with this title.

Bottom-line, this is a dollar game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198034219875', 'num_games_owned': 231, 'num_reviews': 59, 'playtime_forever': 336, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 29, 'last_played': 1413373108}
review:
Gráficos - Lembram o NES, mas não é o NES de jogos ótimos como Zelda, Mario ou Final Fantasy, NOP! É aquele NES dos jogos que o AVGN faz review, sim! Aqueles bem lixosos! Os fudidões!

Steamworks - O único ponto positivo dessa merda! Tem Trading Cards (deixe esse jogo aberto e vá fazer algo útil) e Achievements, PORÉM os achievements são totalmente sem graça e só tão lá pra enfeitar mesmo, deixe pra lá.

Jogabilidade - Uma mistura de plataforma genérico do Mega Drive com...
platafoma genérico (do Mega Drive) do celular, não, não do smartphone, o do celular da Nokia mesmo, aquele inquebrável, exato! Um lixo, não tem graça NENHUMA! Os pulos são uma BOSTA! Os controles também, se você estiver preparado pra fazer todos os achievements, HAHA! Meu caro! Se fudeu! Até você acertar uma plataforma, já se passou 1 hr de jogo!

Som - Preciso dizer? Irritante.

História - *facepalm* HISTÓRIA?!?!?!?! NÃO TEM HISTÓRIA ESSE LIXO!!!!1!!!!onze!!!!

Ainda bem que ganhei de graça essa bosta, vou ir dropar os Trading Cards, agora, única coisa que vou fazer antes de desinstalar esse lixo!

author: {'steamid': '76561198102275691', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 36, 'playtime_forever': 226, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 226, 'last_played': 1410703467}
review:
Canyon Capers è un videogame di genere Platform,sviluppato dalla Crazy Moo Games e pubblicato dalla KISS ltd nel 2014.
Quasi tutti i platform hanno una trama,anche se potrebbe essere banale,ma Canyon Crapers non ha nemmeno quella,le meccaniche di gioco sono fastidiose,la grafica brutta,i livelli tutti molto simili tra di loro,gli scenari orribili,gli spawn point totalmente casuali,traduzioni a dir poco scandalose,power up banali e uno scomparto audio semplice.
Non c'è molto da dire... non lo consiglio.

4/10

review:

1. I thought it will be a really funny arcade game, just like some old NES games... But this game is just too bad..
2. Soundrack is very annoying, i couldn't enjoy game at all...

So i would give this game a strong 4/10

author: {'steamid': '76561198093003722', 'num_games_owned': 991, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 104, 'last_played': 1410688752}
review:
This game might have been a somewhat nice relaxing platformer to play after a long tiring day, if it weren't for the idiotic time limits.  They are way too short, especially (but not only)  in levels where you have to wait for elevators. 
It adds unnecessary frustration to the otherwise mediocre game.

review: After playing this game I already got bored, and if I got bored, someone else will HATE it.  the controls are decent, but definetly lacking, the jump to "stun" enemies is really wonky and ends up missing half the time, and finally most of the levels I've experienced are just really REALLY boring collect-a-thons.  I wouldn't buy this game at its current price, if it was at a dollar or so, I MIGHT buy it.  But at this moment it looks and feels like a flash game, not saying thats a drawback neccessarily, I played some damn good flash games, but this doesn't feel like its worth 7 bucks.

author: {'steamid': '76561198054871821', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 17, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 17, 'last_played': 1410440383}
review: This game is a very oldschool platformer in the bad way. Whole gameplay is based on collecting gems, coins and treasure chests and avoiding monsters. It could be fun but it isn't. Too simple, too repetitive and just borring. Artwork, level design and animations are worse than in most 1990's platformers, and simply ugly. Sound effects are just iritating. Most free flash platformers online for example on Kongregate are made better. Do not waste your money on this crap. I've got this game from  free bundle but it's not worth playing even for free. If you seek for a good platformer avoid this thing at all cost. Believe me even game made in 1993: Magic Boy was more fun to play than this.

author: {'steamid': '76561198085138176', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 168, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 59, 'last_played': 1443955227}
review:
Я получил эту игру- бесплатно. И что могу сказать, получился довольно добротный аркадный платформер. 
-5 абсолютно разных миров.
-множество играбельных персонажей
-разные режимы на уровнях
Также есть и много других плюсов. Но нашлись у игры и минусы:
-Игра переведена на русский, но... маленько корявенько.
-Спрайты в этой игре тоже не очень (как-будто разработчики взяли спрайты из других игр и заляпили в свою).
Ну, на этом всё- 7/10.

author: {'steamid': '76561197972667799', 'num_games_owned': 626, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 1513, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 654, 'last_played': 1411231027}
review:
Canyon Capers is the spiritual successor to the old DOS game of the same name. The game is a collect-athon and a platformer.

Pros:
-The graphics are updated and the characters move faster than from the original.
-There are secret snail pieces to find!
-The music is a bit country, but not that great.
-Interesting variations on the collecting gametype.
-The controls are very solid.
-Every jump is a flip jump.
-The difficulty curve is great.

Comparing the old game and the new game side by side, the difference is like night and day. Check out a let's play video of both. Same but different. Sadly, they both suffer from the items blending in with the background. Especially in this updated version, there is way to much going on to distinguish from baddie, goodie, and just pretty background.

The secret snail pieces are a cool side item. And getting them includes really searching the level. The problem is, I don't know what levels have them. Is it all, or only some?

The game types include: collect A (and B and c) to exit, find the exit and collect items on the way, bombs, and collect A to "feed" a god(s).

Cons:
-Bugs everywhere.
-Enemies respawn very rapidly. Almost pointless to kill them. It is important to note that jumping on enemies does not give a jump boost like in Mario. Enemy kills are very unsatisfying, as are kill combos.
-Scoring is complex.
-Some trial and error to figure out what does and doesn't kill you.
-Navigating the menu system is painfully slow.
-Most levels are very linear. Once you know where the exit is, there is only one way to go to get the best score. Even not knowing where the exit is, you will sometimes go the wrong way.
-Dying is immensely painful.
-Too much waiting for obstacles to move
-Too much unavoidable death or damage.

A few examples of the bugs I have encountered:
-Sometimes jumps kill enemies, sometimes not. I have jumped up into an enemy (it should hurt you, one would think, right?) and it seems to be fifty fifty on who will win.
- I completed a level, then went back to 100% it. But suddenly a jump to the exit was literally impossible. But it was the only way to get to the exit! I tried to make the jump until the time ran out, but could not make it. So I restarted the game, did the level again, and suddenly I could do the jump again, and repeatedly.
-Wyatt is unlocked and locked at the same time. I can access this character, and play as this character, but on the character select screen, the lock symbol is still covering their picture. I have no idea what his special is. There is also no explanation on how to unlock characters. This makes unlocks no fun. Number of stars? Worlds beaten?

At the end of each level, you are presented with a score screen. You get a bonus for extra time, life, and collecting items. But then there are medals... with stars around them sometimes... and they aren't explained at all. Three of them are easy: gems, coins, and chests. But the stars around them... Is it percentage, or that is how many there are in the level? And then there is the secret snail piece medal. Instead of being for one level, it shows the progress for ALL levels at the same time. And there's a thumbs up medal. I have no idea what that means. But the whole game system is based on score to unlock stars and the next world. It should be explained.

I could go on. The game has some interesting ideas, but it really needs to flesh them out. It feels amateurish, but with some polish, it could be pretty awesome.
